   <script type="text/javascript">
    function toPosition(position){
 
 /*	element_to_scroll_to = document.getElementById(position);
 	element_to_scroll_to.scrollIntoView({duration: 2500});
 */	
 
 	$('html, body').animate({
 		scrollTop: $("#" + position).offset().top - 70
 	}, 600);	
 }	
 
 var map;
 var geocoder;
 
 /**
  * The CenterControl adds a control to the map that recenters the map on Chicago.
  * This constructor takes the control DIV as an argument.
  * @constructor
  */
  
 function CenterControl(controlDiv, map) {
 
   // Set CSS for the control border
   var controlUI = document.createElement('div');
   controlUI.style.backgroundColor = '#ac1721';
   controlUI.style.border = '1px solid gray';
   controlUI.style.borderRadius = '0px';
   controlUI.style.boxShadow = '1px 1px 1px black';
   controlUI.style.cursor = 'pointer';
   controlUI.style.marginTop = '22px';
   controlUI.style.marginBottom = '22px';
   controlUI.style.textAlign = 'center';
   controlUI.title = 'Switch to Grid View';
   controlDiv.appendChild(controlUI);
 
   // Set CSS for the control interior
   var controlText = document.createElement('div');
   controlText.style.color = 'rgb(255,255,255)';
   controlText.style.fontFamily = 'Roboto,Arial,sans-serif';
   controlText.style.fontSize = '16px';
   controlText.style.lineHeight = '38px';
   controlText.style.paddingLeft = '10px';
   controlText.style.paddingRight = '10px';
   controlText.innerHTML = 'Switch to Grid View';
   controlUI.appendChild(controlText);
   
 
   // Setup the click event listeners: simply set the map to grid view
 
   google.maps.event.addDomListener(controlUI, 'click', function() {
 //		window.mapmode = 'grid';
 //        $('#map_canvas').height('auto');
 //        load_div('details_ALL.php?PROVINCE=' + window.province + '&CATEGORY=' + window.category,'map_canvas');
 //        var ele=document.getElementById('right_index_box');
 //        ele.style.display='none';
         $('#basic.demo input').switchButton({checked:false});
 
   });
 
 }
 
 function CenterControl2(controlDiv2, map) {  
 
    // Set CSS for the control border
   var controlUI2 = document.createElement('div2');
   controlUI2.style.backgroundColor = '#ac1721';
   controlUI2.style.border = '1px solid gray';
   controlUI2.style.borderRadius = '0px';
   controlUI2.style.cursor = 'pointer';
   controlUI2.style.marginTop = '0px';
   controlUI2.style.marginBottom = '0px';
   controlUI2.style.marginRight = '20px';  
   controlUI2.style.textAlign = 'center';
   controlUI2.title = 'Reset Map';
   controlDiv2.appendChild(controlUI2);
 
   // Set CSS for the control interior
   var controlText2 = document.createElement('div2');
   controlText2.style.color = 'rgb(255,255,255)';
   controlText2.style.fontFamily = 'Roboto,Arial,sans-serif';
   controlText2.style.fontSize = '12px';
   controlText2.style.lineHeight = '27px';
   controlText2.style.paddingLeft = '10px';
   controlText2.style.paddingRight = '10px';
   controlText2.style.paddingTop = '10px';  
   controlText2.style.paddingTop = '10px';  
   controlUI2.style.Height = '40px';         
   controlText2.innerHTML = 'Reset Map';
   controlUI2.appendChild(controlText2); 
   
   
   // Setup the click event listeners: simply rest map
 
   google.maps.event.addDomListener(controlUI2, 'click', function() {
 		load_map_by_province(window.province, window.category);
         toPosition('map_canvas_top');
 
   });
 
 }
 function initialize(province,category,id) {  
 
 window.oldid = '';
 $.blockUI({ overlayCSS: { backgroundColor: '#cee8f4' } }); 
 
 //setmenucolor('home');
 //alert(province);
 //alert('??? ' + category);
 
 // SET MENUS //
 
 
 	
 geocoder = new google.maps.Geocoder();
 
 var selectedMarker;
 
 var pinColor = "9a0d1d";
 var pinImage = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_letter&chld=%E2%80%A2|" + pinColor,
     null, /* size is determined at runtime */
     null, /* origin is 0,0 */
     null, /* anchor is bottom center of the scaled image */
     new google.maps.Size(15, 25));	
 	
 var pinColor1 = "9a0d1d";
 var pinImage1 = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_letter&chld=%E2%80%A2|" + pinColor1,
     null, /* size is determined at runtime */
     null, /* origin is 0,0 */
     null, /* anchor is bottom center of the scaled image */
     new google.maps.Size(15, 25));		
 		
 	
 var pinColor2 = "FF0000";
 var pinImage2 = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_letter&chld=%E2%80%A2|" + pinColor2,
     null, /* size is determined at runtime */
     null, /* origin is 0,0 */
     null, /* anchor is bottom center of the scaled image */
     new google.maps.Size(15, 25));		
 
 var pinColorSelected = "00FF00";
 var pinImageSelected = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_letter&chld=%E2%80%A2|" + pinColorSelected,
     null, /* size is determined at runtime */
     null, /* origin is 0,0 */
     null, /* anchor is bottom center of the scaled image */
     new google.maps.Size(15, 25));											   
 
 
 var pinColorGreen = "00FF00";
 var pinImageGreen = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_letter&chld=%E2%80%A2|" + pinColorGreen,
 new google.maps.Size(21, 34),
 new google.maps.Point(0,0),
 new google.maps.Point(10, 34));
 
 var pinColorSelectedGreen = "FFFF00";
 var pinImageSelectedGreen = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_letter&chld=%E2%80%A2|" + pinColorSelectedGreen,
 new google.maps.Size(31, 44),
 new google.maps.Point(0,0),
 new google.maps.Point(10, 34));
 
 var pinColorLabels = "00FF00";
 var pinImageLabels = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_letter&chld=%E2%80%A2|" + pinColorLabels,
 new google.maps.Size(31, 44),
 new google.maps.Point(0,0),
 new google.maps.Point(10, 34));
 
 var pinShadow = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_shadow",
 new google.maps.Size(40, 37),
 new google.maps.Point(0, 0),
 new google.maps.Point(12, 35));
 
 
 	  // Create an array of styles. 
 	  
 	  var styles = [
 	  {
 		featureType: "all",
 		elementType: "labels",
 		stylers: [
 		  { visibility: "true" }
 		]
 	  }
 	];	 
 				 
 	// Create a new StyledMapType object, passing it the array of styles,  // as well as the name to be displayed on the map type control. 
 	  
 	var styledMap = new google.maps.StyledMapType(styles,    {name: "Styled Map"});
 	
 	var mapOptions = {          
 	zoom: 9, 
 	scrollwheel: true,
 	scaleControl: true,
 	mapTypeId: google.maps.MapTypeId.HYBRID
 	};    
 	
 	// var id = "map_canvas";    
 	
 	var map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById(id),            
 	mapOptions);  
 	window.map = map;
 
 	var xpan = 0;
 	var ypan = 0;
 	
   // Create the DIV to hold the control and
   // call the CenterControl() constructor passing
   // in this DIV.
 //  var centerControlDiv = document.createElement('div');
 //  var centerControl = new CenterControl(centerControlDiv, map);
 //
 //  centerControlDiv.index = 1;
 //  map.controls[google.maps.ControlPosition.TOP_LEFT].push(centerControlDiv);	
 //  
 //  var centerControlDiv2 = document.createElement('div2');
 //  var centerControl2 = new CenterControl2(centerControlDiv2, map);
 //
 //  centerControlDiv2.index = 1;
 //  map.controls[google.maps.ControlPosition.TOP_RIGHT].push(centerControlDiv2);	
 
 	
 	if (province == 1)
 	{
 		var country = 'New Brunswick, Canada';
 		var xzoom = 0;	
 //		$('#province_picker option[value="1"]').attr('selected','selected');
 	} else if (province == 2)
 	{
 		var country = 'Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada';
 		var xzoom = 2;	
 		var ypan = 520;	
 		var xpan = 300;
 //		$('#province_picker option[value="2"]').attr('selected','selected');		
 	} else if (province == 3)
 	{
 		var country = 'Nova Scotia, Canada';
 		var xzoom = 0;		
 //		$('#province_picker option[value="3"]').attr('selected','selected');		
 	} else if (province == 4)
 	{
 		var country = 'Prince Edward Island, Canada';
 		var xzoom = 0;	
 		var ypan = 0;	
 //		$('#province_picker option[value="4"]').attr('selected','selected');		
 	} else if (province == 5)
 	{
 		var country = 'St. Pierre and Miquelon';
 		var xzoom = 0;	
 		var ypan = 0;	
 //		$('#province_picker option[value="4"]').attr('selected','selected');		
 	}
 //	if (category == null)
 //	{
 
 		geocoder.geocode( {'address' : country}, function(results, status) {
 			if (status == google.maps.GeocoderStatus.OK) {
 				  result = results[0].geometry.location;
 				  window.result = result;
 				  result2 = results[0].geometry.bounds;
 				  window.result2 = result2;
 				  console.log(result);
 				  map.setCenter(result);
 				  map.fitBounds(results[0].geometry.bounds);
 				  map.setZoom(map.getZoom() + xzoom);
 				  map.panBy(xpan, ypan );
 			}  else {
 		  alert('Geocode was not successful for the following reason: ' + status);
 		}
 		});
 
 //	}
 
 //	var listener = google.maps.event.addListener(map, "idle", function() { 
 //	  if (map.getZoom() > 6) map.setZoom(6); 
 //	  google.maps.event.removeListener(listener); 
 //	});
 		
 		
 			
 	//Associate the styled map with the MapTypeId and set it to display. 
 	/* map.mapTypes.set('map_style', styledMap);  map.setMapTypeId('map_style'); */
 	
 	var rendererOptions = { 
 	map: map, 
 	polylineOptions:{strokeColor:'#FF1919',strokeWeight:3,strokeOpacity:0.88},
 	preserveViewport: true  
 	};
 	
 	var rendererOptions_blue = { 
 	map: map, 
 	polylineOptions:{strokeColor:'blue',strokeWeight:5,strokeOpacity:0.88},
 	preserveViewport: true  
 	};
 	
 	var rendererOptions_TC = { 
 	map: map, 
 	polylineOptions:{strokeColor:'white',strokeWeight:2,strokeOpacity:0.55},
 	preserveViewport: true  
 	};		
 			
 	/*-------------------------------------------*/
 			
 
 	
 	/*-------------------------------------------*/
 
 
 //@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@//
 //@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ M A R K E R S @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@//
 //@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@//	
 
   
   var checkboxSouth = document.getElementById('checkboxSouth').checked;
 var checkboxWest = document.getElementById('checkboxWest').checked;
 var checkboxEast = document.getElementById('checkboxEast').checked;
 var checkboxNorth = document.getElementById('checkboxNorth').checked;
 
 if (category == 'attractions' && province == '2') {var thisPennant = 2;
 if ((checkboxSouth == true && thisPennant == 1) ||
 				         (checkboxWest  == true && thisPennant == 2) ||
 					     (checkboxEast  == true && thisPennant == 3) ||
 					     (checkboxNorth == true && thisPennant == 4))
 				{
 
 // MARKER - Tracey Hill Trail //
 
 
 var trails_tracey_hill = new google.maps.LatLng(51.733000,-56.439500);
 var marker_trails_tracey_hill = new MarkerWithLabel ({
 position: trails_tracey_hill,
 draggable: false,
 map: map,
 icon: pinImage,
 shadow: pinShadow,
 zIndex: 1000,
 labelContent: "Tracey Hill Trail",
 labelAnchor: new google.maps.Point(-8,35),
 labelClass: 'labels_premium', // the CSS class for the label
 labelStyle: {opacity: 1.00},
 labelVisible: false});
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_trails_tracey_hill, 'click', function() {
 toPosition('map_canvas2');
 map.setCenter(marker_trails_tracey_hill.getPosition());window.markerClicked = 'Y';
 window.latlongz = marker_trails_tracey_hill.getPosition();
 window.idnamez = "Tracey Hill Trail";
 window.custom_map_zoom = "7";
 map.panBy(0, 0);
 window.photochosen='#photo1';
 set_individual_map_parms("7","51.733000","-56.439500","");load_div("details_individual.php?ID=trails_tracey_hill","map_canvas2","","","yes");var ele=document.getElementById("map_canvas2");ele.style.display="block";ele=document.getElementById("map_canvas");ele.style.display="none";var ele=document.getElementById("right_index_box");ele.style.display="none";var ele=document.getElementById("filters");ele.style.display="none";window.idz="trails_tracey_hill";initialize_individual();if (selectedMarker) {
     if (selectedMarkerType == '2') {
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage2);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1002);
 } else if (selectedMarkerType == '1')	{
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage1);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1001);
 } else {
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1000);
 }
     selectedMarker.set('labelVisible', false);
 }
 
 marker_trails_tracey_hill.setIcon(pinImageSelected);
 marker_trails_tracey_hill.setZIndex(1005);
 marker_trails_tracey_hill.set('labelVisible', false);
 selectedMarker = marker_trails_tracey_hill;
 selectedMarkerType = 0;
 });
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_trails_tracey_hill, 'mouseover', function() {
 marker_trails_tracey_hill.set('labelVisible', true);
 });
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_trails_tracey_hill, 'mouseout', function() {
 marker_trails_tracey_hill.set('labelVisible', false);
 });

 if ((checkboxSouth == true && thisPennant == 1) ||

 					     (checkboxNorth == true && thisPennant == 4))
 				{
 
 // MARKER - Crow Head Trail //
 
 
 var trails_crow_head = new google.maps.LatLng(50.650300,-57.286900);

 var marker_port_au_choix_historic = new MarkerWithLabel ({
 position: port_au_choix_historic,
 draggable: false,
 map: map,
 icon: pinImage,
 shadow: pinShadow,
 zIndex: 1000,
 labelContent: "Port au Choix<br /> National Historic Site",
 labelAnchor: new google.maps.Point(0,48),
 labelClass: 'labels_premium', // the CSS class for the label
 labelStyle: {opacity: 1.00},
 labelVisible: false});
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_port_au_choix_historic, 'click', function() {
 toPosition('map_canvas2');
 map.setCenter(marker_port_au_choix_historic.getPosition());window.markerClicked = 'Y';
 window.latlongz = marker_port_au_choix_historic.getPosition();
 window.idnamez = "Port au Choix<br /> National Historic Site";
 window.custom_map_zoom = "7";
 map.panBy(0, 0);
 window.photochosen='#photo1';
 set_individual_map_parms("7","50.702910","-57.351120","");load_div("details_individual.php?ID=port_au_choix_historic","map_canvas2","","","yes");var ele=document.getElementById("map_canvas2");ele.style.display="block";ele=document.getElementById("map_canvas");ele.style.display="none";var ele=document.getElementById("right_index_box");ele.style.display="none";var ele=document.getElementById("filters");ele.style.display="none";window.idz="port_au_choix_historic";initialize_individual();if (selectedMarker) {
     if (selectedMarkerType == '2') {
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage2);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1002);
 } else if (selectedMarkerType == '1')	{
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage1);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1001);
 } else {
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1000);
 }
     selectedMarker.set('labelVisible', false);
 }
 
 marker_port_au_choix_historic.setIcon(pinImageSelected);
 marker_port_au_choix_historic.setZIndex(1005);
 marker_port_au_choix_historic.set('labelVisible', false);
 selectedMarker = marker_port_au_choix_historic;
 selectedMarkerType = 0;
 });
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_port_au_choix_historic, 'mouseover', function() {
 marker_port_au_choix_historic.set('labelVisible', true);
 });
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_port_au_choix_historic, 'mouseout', function() {
 marker_port_au_choix_historic.set('labelVisible', false);
 });
 
 }var thisPennant = 1;
 if ((checkboxSouth == true && thisPennant == 1) ||
 				         (checkboxWest  == true && thisPennant == 2) ||

 					     (checkboxNorth == true && thisPennant == 4))
 				{

     if (selectedMarkerType == '2') {

     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage);

 var marker_trails_deer_lake = new MarkerWithLabel ({
 position: trails_deer_lake,
 draggable: false,
 map: map,
 icon: pinImage,
 shadow: pinShadow,
 zIndex: 1000,
 labelContent: "Deer Lake Trail",
 labelAnchor: new google.maps.Point(0,0),
 labelClass: 'labels_premium', // the CSS class for the label
 labelStyle: {opacity: 1.00},
 labelVisible: false});
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_trails_deer_lake, 'click', function() {
 toPosition('map_canvas2');
 map.setCenter(marker_trails_deer_lake.getPosition());window.markerClicked = 'Y';
 window.latlongz = marker_trails_deer_lake.getPosition();
 window.idnamez = "Deer Lake Trail";
 window.custom_map_zoom = "7";
 map.panBy(0, 0);
 window.photochosen='#photo1';
 set_individual_map_parms("7","49.182900","-57.426700","");load_div("details_individual.php?ID=trails_deer_lake","map_canvas2","","","yes");var ele=document.getElementById("map_canvas2");ele.style.display="block";ele=document.getElementById("map_canvas");ele.style.display="none";var ele=document.getElementById("right_index_box");ele.style.display="none";var ele=document.getElementById("filters");ele.style.display="none";window.idz="trails_deer_lake";initialize_individual();if (selectedMarker) {
     if (selectedMarkerType == '2') {
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage2);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1002);
 } else if (selectedMarkerType == '1')	{
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage1);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1001);
 } else {
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1000);
 }
     selectedMarker.set('labelVisible', false);
 }
 
 marker_trails_deer_lake.setIcon(pinImageSelected);
 marker_trails_deer_lake.setZIndex(1005);
 marker_trails_deer_lake.set('labelVisible', false);
 selectedMarker = marker_trails_deer_lake;
 selectedMarkerType = 0;
 });
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_trails_deer_lake, 'mouseover', function() {
 marker_trails_deer_lake.set('labelVisible', true);
 });
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_trails_deer_lake, 'mouseout', function() {
 marker_trails_deer_lake.set('labelVisible', false);
 });

     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1001);

 icon: pinImage,
 shadow: pinShadow,
 zIndex: 1000,
 labelContent: "Forteau",
 labelAnchor: new google.maps.Point(35,12),
 labelClass: 'labels_premium', // the CSS class for the label
 labelStyle: {opacity: 1.00},
 labelVisible: false});
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_town_forteau, 'click', function() {
 toPosition('position');
 map.setCenter(marker_town_forteau.getPosition());window.markerClicked = 'Y';
 window.latlongz = marker_town_forteau.getPosition();
 window.idnamez = "Forteau";
 window.custom_map_zoom = "7";
 map.panBy(0, 0);
 load_div('towns_sub.php?ID=town_forteau','index_right','town_forteau');
 set_dropdown('town_forteau','towns_dropdown');
 if (selectedMarker) {
     if (selectedMarkerType == '2') {
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage2);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1002);
 } else if (selectedMarkerType == '1')	{
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage1);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1001);
 } else {
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1000);
 }
     selectedMarker.set('labelVisible', false);
 }
 
 marker_town_forteau.setIcon(pinImageSelected);
 marker_town_forteau.setZIndex(1005);
 marker_town_forteau.set('labelVisible', false);
 selectedMarker = marker_town_forteau;
 selectedMarkerType = 0;
 var ele = document.getElementById('right_index_box');
 ele.style.display = 'block';
 });
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_town_forteau, 'mouseover', function() {
 marker_town_forteau.set('labelVisible', true);
 });
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_town_forteau, 'mouseout', function() {
 marker_town_forteau.set('labelVisible', false);
 });

 set_dropdown('town_great_brehat','towns_dropdown');
 if (selectedMarker) {
     if (selectedMarkerType == '2') {
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage2);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1002);
 } else if (selectedMarkerType == '1')	{
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage1);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1001);
 } else {
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1000);
 }
     selectedMarker.set('labelVisible', false);
 }
 
 marker_town_great_brehat.setIcon(pinImageSelected);
 marker_town_great_brehat.setZIndex(1005);
 marker_town_great_brehat.set('labelVisible', false);
 selectedMarker = marker_town_great_brehat;
 selectedMarkerType = 0;
 var ele = document.getElementById('right_index_box');
 ele.style.display = 'block';
 });
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_town_great_brehat, 'mouseover', function() {
 marker_town_great_brehat.set('labelVisible', true);
 });
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_town_great_brehat, 'mouseout', function() {
 marker_town_great_brehat.set('labelVisible', false);
 });

 if ((checkboxSouth == true && thisPennant == 1) ||
 				         (checkboxWest  == true && thisPennant == 2) ||
 					     (checkboxEast  == true && thisPennant == 3) ||
 					     (checkboxNorth == true && thisPennant == 4))
 				{
 
 // MARKER - Plum Point //
 
 
 var town_plum_point = new google.maps.LatLng(51.075000,-56.884440);
 var marker_town_plum_point = new MarkerWithLabel ({
 position: town_plum_point,
 draggable: false,
 map: map,
 icon: pinImage,
 shadow: pinShadow,
 zIndex: 1000,
 labelContent: "Plum Point",
 labelAnchor: new google.maps.Point(0,7),
 labelClass: 'labels_premium', // the CSS class for the label
 labelStyle: {opacity: 1.00},
 labelVisible: false});
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_town_plum_point, 'click', function() {
 toPosition('position');
 map.setCenter(marker_town_plum_point.getPosition());window.markerClicked = 'Y';
 window.latlongz = marker_town_plum_point.getPosition();
 window.idnamez = "Plum Point";
 window.custom_map_zoom = "7";
 map.panBy(0, 0);
 load_div('towns_sub.php?ID=town_plum_point','index_right','town_plum_point');
 set_dropdown('town_plum_point','towns_dropdown');
 if (selectedMarker) {
     if (selectedMarkerType == '2') {
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage2);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1002);
 } else if (selectedMarkerType == '1')	{
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage1);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1001);
 } else {
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1000);
 }
     selectedMarker.set('labelVisible', false);
 }
 
 marker_town_plum_point.setIcon(pinImageSelected);
 marker_town_plum_point.setZIndex(1005);
 marker_town_plum_point.set('labelVisible', false);
 selectedMarker = marker_town_plum_point;
 selectedMarkerType = 0;
 var ele = document.getElementById('right_index_box');
 ele.style.display = 'block';
 });
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_town_plum_point, 'mouseover', function() {
 marker_town_plum_point.set('labelVisible', true);
 });
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_town_plum_point, 'mouseout', function() {
 marker_town_plum_point.set('labelVisible', false);
 });

 load_div('towns_sub.php?ID=town_st_carols','index_right','town_st_carols');
 set_dropdown('town_st_carols','towns_dropdown');
 if (selectedMarker) {
     if (selectedMarkerType == '2') {
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage2);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1002);
 } else if (selectedMarkerType == '1')	{
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage1);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1001);
 } else {
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1000);
 }
     selectedMarker.set('labelVisible', false);
 }
 
 marker_town_st_carols.setIcon(pinImageSelected);
 marker_town_st_carols.setZIndex(1005);
 marker_town_st_carols.set('labelVisible', false);
 selectedMarker = marker_town_st_carols;
 selectedMarkerType = 0;
 var ele = document.getElementById('right_index_box');
 ele.style.display = 'block';
 });
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_town_st_carols, 'mouseover', function() {
 marker_town_st_carols.set('labelVisible', true);
 });
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_town_st_carols, 'mouseout', function() {
 marker_town_st_carols.set('labelVisible', false);
 });

     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1001);
 } else {
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1000);
 }
     selectedMarker.set('labelVisible', false);
 }

 marker_driftwood_inn.setZIndex(1005);
 marker_driftwood_inn.set('labelVisible', false);
 selectedMarker = marker_driftwood_inn;
 selectedMarkerType = 0;
 });

 marker_driftwood_inn.set('labelVisible', true);
 });

 marker_driftwood_inn.set('labelVisible', false);
 });

     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1002);
 } else if (selectedMarkerType == '1')	{
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage1);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1001);
 } else {
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1000);
 }
     selectedMarker.set('labelVisible', false);
 }
 
 marker_thickwood_inn.setIcon(pinImageSelected);
 marker_thickwood_inn.setZIndex(1005);
 marker_thickwood_inn.set('labelVisible', false);
 selectedMarker = marker_thickwood_inn;
 selectedMarkerType = 0;
 });
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_thickwood_inn, 'mouseover', function() {
 marker_thickwood_inn.set('labelVisible', true);
 });
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_thickwood_inn, 'mouseout', function() {
 marker_thickwood_inn.set('labelVisible', false);
 });

 position: northern_delight,
 draggable: false,
 map: map,
 icon: pinImage,
 shadow: pinShadow,
 zIndex: 1000,
 labelContent: "Northern<br />Delight",
 labelAnchor: new google.maps.Point(30,0),
 labelClass: 'labels_premium', // the CSS class for the label
 labelStyle: {opacity: 1.00},
 labelVisible: false});
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_northern_delight, 'click', function() {
 toPosition('map_canvas2');
 map.setCenter(marker_northern_delight.getPosition());window.markerClicked = 'Y';
 window.latlongz = marker_northern_delight.getPosition();
 window.idnamez = "Northern<br />Delight";
 window.custom_map_zoom = "7";
 map.panBy(0, 0);
 window.photochosen='#photo1';
 set_individual_map_parms("7","51.546870","-55.475640","");load_div("details_individual.php?ID=northern_delight","map_canvas2","","","yes");var ele=document.getElementById("map_canvas2");ele.style.display="block";ele=document.getElementById("map_canvas");ele.style.display="none";var ele=document.getElementById("right_index_box");ele.style.display="none";var ele=document.getElementById("filters");ele.style.display="none";window.idz="northern_delight";initialize_individual();if (selectedMarker) {
     if (selectedMarkerType == '2') {
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage2);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1002);
 } else if (selectedMarkerType == '1')	{
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage1);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1001);
 } else {
     selectedMarker.setIcon(pinImage);
     selectedMarker.setZIndex(1000);
 }
     selectedMarker.set('labelVisible', false);
 }
 
 marker_northern_delight.setIcon(pinImageSelected);
 marker_northern_delight.setZIndex(1005);
 marker_northern_delight.set('labelVisible', false);
 selectedMarker = marker_northern_delight;
 selectedMarkerType = 0;
 });
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_northern_delight, 'mouseover', function() {
 marker_northern_delight.set('labelVisible', true);
 });
 
 google.maps.event.addListener(marker_northern_delight, 'mouseout', function() {
 marker_northern_delight.set('labelVisible', false);
 });

 marker_tours_moose_hunt.set('labelVisible', false);
 });

 function initialize_individual() {  
 
 window.galleryphoto = 1;
 //alert(window.galleryphoto);
 
 
 //setmenucolor('home');
 //alert(province);
 //alert(category);
 //alert(id);
 //alert('test');
 // SET MENUS //
 
 var selectedMarker;
 
 var pinColor = "FF0000";
 var pinImage = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_letter&chld=%E2%80%A2|" + pinColor,
     null, /* size is determined at runtime */
     null, /* origin is 0,0 */
     null, /* anchor is bottom center of the scaled image */
     new google.maps.Size(15, 25));		
 
 var pinColorSelected = "00FF00";
 var pinImageSelected = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_letter&chld=%E2%80%A2|" + pinColorSelected,
     null, /* size is determined at runtime */
     null, /* origin is 0,0 */
     null, /* anchor is bottom center of the scaled image */
     new google.maps.Size(27, 45));											   
 
 
 var pinColorGreen = "00FF00";
 var pinImageGreen = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_letter&chld=%E2%80%A2|" + pinColorGreen,
 new google.maps.Size(21, 34),
 new google.maps.Point(0,0),
 new google.maps.Point(10, 34));
 
 var pinColorSelectedGreen = "FFFF00";
 var pinImageSelectedGreen = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_letter&chld=%E2%80%A2|" + pinColorSelectedGreen,
 new google.maps.Size(31, 44),
 new google.maps.Point(0,0),
 new google.maps.Point(10, 34));
 
 var pinColorLabels = "00FF00";
 var pinImageLabels = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_letter&chld=%E2%80%A2|" + pinColorLabels,
 new google.maps.Size(31, 44),
 new google.maps.Point(0,0),
 new google.maps.Point(10, 34));
 
 var pinShadow = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_shadow",
 new google.maps.Size(40, 37),
 new google.maps.Point(12, 35));
 
 
 	  // Create an array of styles. 
 	  
 	  var styles = [
 	  {
 		featureType: "all",
 		elementType: "labels",
 		stylers: [
 		  { visibility: "true" }
 		]
 	  }
 	];	 
 				 
 	// Create a new StyledMapType object, passing it the array of styles,  // as well as the name to be displayed on the map type control. 
 	var custom_map_zoom = Number(window.custom_map_zoom);
 	var styledMap = new google.maps.StyledMapType(styles,    {name: "Styled Map"});
 	//alert(window.latlongz);
 	var mapOptions = {         
 	center: window.latlongz,  
 	zoom: custom_map_zoom,     
 	scrollwheel: true,
 	scaleControl: true,
 	mapTypeId: google.maps.MapTypeId.HYBRID	
 	};        
 	// alert('before');
     //alert(window.individualLevel);
 	var map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map_canvas_individual'),            
 	mapOptions);      	
     // alert('category0: ' + category + ' || Province0: ' + province);
     
     
       var marker = new MarkerWithLabel({
       position: window.latlongz,
       map: map,
 //      labelClass: 'labels_premium',
 //      labelContent: window.idnamez,
 		icon: pinImageSelected,
 		shadow: pinShadow
   });
   
 
 }
 
 function initialize_individual2() {  
 
 window.galleryphoto = 1;
 //alert(window.galleryphoto);
 
 
 //setmenucolor('home');
 //alert(province);
 //alert(category);
 //alert(id);
 //alert('test');
 // SET MENUS //
 
 var selectedMarker;
 
 var pinColor = "FF0000";
 var pinImage = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_letter&chld=%E2%80%A2|" + pinColor,
     null, /* size is determined at runtime */
     null, /* origin is 0,0 */
     null, /* anchor is bottom center of the scaled image */
     new google.maps.Size(15, 25));		
 
 var pinColorSelected = "00FF00";
 var pinImageSelected = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_letter&chld=%E2%80%A2|" + pinColorSelected,
     null, /* size is determined at runtime */
     null, /* origin is 0,0 */
     null, /* anchor is bottom center of the scaled image */
     new google.maps.Size(27, 45));											   
 
 
 var pinColorGreen = "00FF00";
 var pinImageGreen = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_letter&chld=%E2%80%A2|" + pinColorGreen,
 new google.maps.Size(21, 34),
 new google.maps.Point(0,0),
 new google.maps.Point(10, 34));
 
 var pinColorSelectedGreen = "FFFF00";
 var pinImageSelectedGreen = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_letter&chld=%E2%80%A2|" + pinColorSelectedGreen,
 new google.maps.Size(31, 44),
 new google.maps.Point(0,0),
 new google.maps.Point(10, 34));
 
 var pinColorLabels = "00FF00";
 var pinImageLabels = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_letter&chld=%E2%80%A2|" + pinColorLabels,
 new google.maps.Size(31, 44),
 new google.maps.Point(0,0),
 new google.maps.Point(10, 34));
 
 var pinShadow = new google.maps.MarkerImage("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chst=d_map_pin_shadow",
 new google.maps.Size(40, 37),
 new google.maps.Point(12, 35));
 
 
 	  // Create an array of styles. 
 	  
 	  var styles = [
 	  {
 		featureType: "all",
 		elementType: "labels",
 		stylers: [
 		  { visibility: "true" }
 		]
 	  }
 	];	 
 				 
 	// Create a new StyledMapType object, passing it the array of styles,  // as well as the name to be displayed on the map type control. 
 	var custom_map_zoom = Number(window.custom_map_zoom);
 	var styledMap = new google.maps.StyledMapType(styles,    {name: "Styled Map"});
 	//alert(window.latlongz);
 	var mapOptions = {         
 	center: window.latlongz,  
 	zoom: custom_map_zoom,     
 	scrollwheel: true,
 	scaleControl: true,
 	mapTypeId: google.maps.MapTypeId.HYBRID	
 	};        
 	// alert('before');
     //alert(window.individualLevel);
 	var map = new google.maps.Map(document.getElementById('map_canvas_individual2'),            
 	mapOptions);      	
     // alert('category0: ' + category + ' || Province0: ' + province);
     
     
       var marker = new MarkerWithLabel({
       position: window.latlongz,
       map: map,
 //      labelClass: 'labels_premium',
 //      labelContent: window.idnamez,
 		icon: pinImageSelected,
 		shadow: pinShadow
   });
   
 
 }
 
 	var xmlhttp;
 	
 	if (window.XMLHttpRequest)
 	  {// code for IE7+, Firefox, Chrome, Opera, Safari
 	  xmlhttp=new XMLHttpRequest();
 	  }
 	else
 	  {// code for IE6, IE5
 	  xmlhttp=new ActiveXObject("Microsoft.XMLHTTP");
 	  }
   
     function load_div(passed_file, passed_id, entity, scrollTop, individual) {
 		  //alert('1: ' + passed_file);
 		 // alert('entity'+entity);
 		 // alert(passed_file);
 		 // alert(passed_id);
   
 		  $.blockUI({ overlayCSS: { backgroundColor: '#cee8f4' } }); 
 		  
 		  if (passed_file == 'home.php' || passed_file == 'join.php' || passed_file == 'postEvent.php' || passed_file == 'advertise.php' || passed_file == 'web_design.php')
 		  {
 			  window.homepage = 'Y';
 		  } else if (passed_file != 'menu_home.php')
 		  {
 			  window.homepage = 'N';
 		  }
 		  
 //		  var ele = document.getElementById("right_index_box");	
 //		  if (ele != null) { ele.style.display = "none"; } 
 	 	  
 			$.ajax({
 				url:passed_file,
 				contentType: "text/html;charset=ISO-8859-1",
 				type:"GET",
 				async:false,
 				success:function(result){
 				
 					$('#' + passed_id).html(result);			
 				
 					}
 				});
 
 				if (scrollTop != "N" && window.mapmode == 'map')
 				{
 				 document.getElementById(passed_id).scrollTop = 0;
 				}
 						
 				if (entity == 'search')
 				{
 				document.getElementById("search_box").focus();  
 				}
 				
 		
 //				if (individual == 'yes') { initialize_individual();	}
 
 				  if (passed_file == 'home.php')
 				  {
 					var delay=15000; // 1 seconds
 					setTimeout(function(){
 						video_random();
 					},delay); 				
 				  }
 
 
 	    setTimeout($.unblockUI, 0); 
 	  
     }
 	
 	
 	function set_individual_map_parms(ZOOM,LAT,LONG,NAME) {
 
 		window.latlongz = new google.maps.LatLng(LAT,LONG);
 		window.idnamez = NAME;
 		window.custom_map_zoom = ZOOM;
 		
 	}
 	
 	function jquery_ajax_load(passed_file,target_div) {
 	  //alert('2: ' + passed_file);
 		  if (passed_file == 'home.php' || passed_file == 'join.php' || passed_file == 'postEvent.php' || passed_file == 'advertise.php' || passed_file == 'web_design.php')
 	  {
 		  window.homepage = 'Y';
 	  } else if (passed_file != 'menu_home.php')
 	  {
 		  window.homepage = 'N';
 	  }
 		  
 	//alert(passed_file);
 	//alert(target_div);
 	
     $.ajax({url:passed_file,async:false,success:function(result){
       $(target_div).html(result);
     }});
 
 	}
 	
 	function jquery_ajax_load_b(passed_file,target_div) {
 //	alert(passed_file);
 //	alert(target_div);
 		  //alert('3: ' + passed_file);
 		  if (passed_file == 'home.php' || passed_file == 'join.php' || passed_file == 'postEvent.php' || passed_file == 'advertise.php' || passed_file == 'web_design.php')
 		  {
 			  window.homepage = 'Y';
 		  } else if (passed_file != 'menu_home.php')
 		  {
 			  window.homepage = 'N';
 		  }
 	
 		$.ajax({url:passed_file,type:"GET",dataType:"html",async:false,success:function(result){
 		  $(target_div).html(result);
 		}});
 		var ele = document.getElementById("map_canvas2");		
 		if (ele != null) { ele.style.display = "none"; } 
 		var ele = document.getElementById("map_canvas3");		
 		if (ele != null) { ele.style.display = "none"; } 
 		var ele2 = document.getElementById("right_index_box");		
 		if (ele2 != null) { ele2.style.display = "none"; } 	
 		var ele2 = document.getElementById("map_canvas");		
 		if (ele2 != null) { ele2.style.display = "block"; } 
 			
 		$("#datepicker_start").datepicker({
 		minDate: '0',
 		numberOfMonths: 2,		
 		onSelect: function(selected) {$("#datepicker_end").datepicker("option","minDate", selected);valid_quote('STARTDATE');}
 
 		});
 		
 		$("#datepicker_end").datepicker({
 		minDate: '0',
 		numberOfMonths: 2,
 		onSelect: function(selected) {$("#datepicker_start").datepicker("option","maxDate", selected);valid_quote('ENDDATE')}		
 		});
 		
 	}	
 	
     function load_div2(passed_file, passed_id, province) {	
 		  //alert('4: ' + passed_file);
 		  if (passed_file == 'home.php' || passed_file == 'join.php' || passed_file == 'postEvent.php' || passed_file == 'advertise.php' || passed_file == 'web_design.php')
 		  {
 			  window.homepage = 'Y';
 		  } else if (passed_file != 'menu_home.php')
 		  {
 			  window.homepage = 'N';
 		  }
 
 		var ele = document.getElementById("right_index_box");	
 		if (ele != null) {ele.style.display = "none";}	
 		if (province != null)
 		{
 			$.blockUI({ overlayCSS: { backgroundColor: '#cee8f4' } }); 
 		}
 		var delay=1000;//1 seconds
 		setTimeout(function(){
 			  if (province != null)
 			  {
 			  	passed_file = passed_file + "?prov_selected=" + province;
 			  }
 
 			  xmlhttp.abort();
 			  xmlhttp.open("GET", passed_file, true);
 			  xmlhttp.onreadystatechange=function() 
 			  {
 				  
 				if(xmlhttp.readyState == 4) {
 						  //alert('within load_div now');	  
 				  <!-- document.getElementById(passed_id).src = xmlhttp.responseText; -->
 				  document.getElementById(passed_id).innerHTML = xmlhttp.responseText;
 				
 				}
 			  }
 			  xmlhttp.send(null);
 				  if (passed_file == 'home.php')
 				  {
 					var delay=15000; // 1 seconds
 					setTimeout(function(){
 						video_random();
 					},delay); 				
 				  }
 			  setTimeout($.unblockUI, 100); 
 	
 		},delay); 
 
 	  
     }
 	
 	function set_dropdown(passed_value, passed_id) {
 //		alert(passed_value);
 //		alert(passed_id);
 		passed_id = 'PROVINCE_DROPDOWN';
 		document.getElementById(passed_id).value = passed_value;	
 	}
 	
 	function getCookie2(c_name)
 	{
 	var i,x,y,ARRcookies=document.cookie.split(";");
 	for (i=0;i<ARRcookies.length;i++)
 	  {
 	  x=ARRcookies[i].substr(0,ARRcookies[i].indexOf("="));
 	  y=ARRcookies[i].substr(ARRcookies[i].indexOf("=")+1);
 	  x=x.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,"");
 	  if (x==c_name)
 		{
 		return unescape(y);
 		}
 	  }
 	}	
 	
 	function check_cookie(DBID) {
 
 	var favourites_cookie;
 	favourites_cookie = getCookie2('favourites');
 
 	if (favourites_cookie!=null && favourites_cookie!="")
 	{
 		// alert('COOKIE  FOUND: ' + favourites_cookie);
 		
 		new_favourites_cookie = favourites_cookie.split(',');
 		
 		for (var i = 0, length = new_favourites_cookie.length; i < length; i++) {	
 
 				var chunk = new_favourites_cookie[i];
 		
 				if(chunk == DBID)
 				{	
 					x = "Y";
 					return x;
 				} 		
 		}	
 	} 
 	
 	x = "N";
 	return x; 
 }

   <script>
    function cleanUpSpecialChars(str)
 {
 	
     str = str.replace(/[ÀÁÂÃÄÅ]/g,"A");
     str = str.replace(/[àáâãäå]/g,"a");
     str = str.replace(/[ÈÉÊË]/g,"E");
 	str = str.replace(/&amp;/g,"&");
 	str = str.replace(/[é]/g,"e");
 	//alert(str);
     return str; // final clean up
 }
 function removeDiacritics (str) {
 
   var defaultDiacriticsRemovalMap = [
     {'base':'A', 'letters':/[\u0041\u24B6\uFF21\u00C0\u00C1\u00C2\u1EA6\u1EA4\u1EAA\u1EA8\u00C3\u0100\u0102\u1EB0\u1EAE\u1EB4\u1EB2\u0226\u01E0\u00C4\u01DE\u1EA2\u00C5\u01FA\u01CD\u0200\u0202\u1EA0\u1EAC\u1EB6\u1E00\u0104\u023A\u2C6F]/g},
     {'base':'AA','letters':/[\uA732]/g},
     {'base':'AE','letters':/[\u00C6\u01FC\u01E2]/g},
     {'base':'AO','letters':/[\uA734]/g},
     {'base':'AU','letters':/[\uA736]/g},
     {'base':'AV','letters':/[\uA738\uA73A]/g},
     {'base':'AY','letters':/[\uA73C]/g},
     {'base':'B', 'letters':/[\u0042\u24B7\uFF22\u1E02\u1E04\u1E06\u0243\u0182\u0181]/g},
     {'base':'C', 'letters':/[\u0043\u24B8\uFF23\u0106\u0108\u010A\u010C\u00C7\u1E08\u0187\u023B\uA73E]/g},
     {'base':'D', 'letters':/[\u0044\u24B9\uFF24\u1E0A\u010E\u1E0C\u1E10\u1E12\u1E0E\u0110\u018B\u018A\u0189\uA779]/g},
     {'base':'DZ','letters':/[\u01F1\u01C4]/g},
     {'base':'Dz','letters':/[\u01F2\u01C5]/g},
     {'base':'E', 'letters':/[\u0045\u24BA\uFF25\u00C8\u00C9\u00CA\u1EC0\u1EBE\u1EC4\u1EC2\u1EBC\u0112\u1E14\u1E16\u0114\u0116\u00CB\u1EBA\u011A\u0204\u0206\u1EB8\u1EC6\u0228\u1E1C\u0118\u1E18\u1E1A\u0190\u018E]/g},
     {'base':'F', 'letters':/[\u0046\u24BB\uFF26\u1E1E\u0191\uA77B]/g},
     {'base':'G', 'letters':/[\u0047\u24BC\uFF27\u01F4\u011C\u1E20\u011E\u0120\u01E6\u0122\u01E4\u0193\uA7A0\uA77D\uA77E]/g},
     {'base':'H', 'letters':/[\u0048\u24BD\uFF28\u0124\u1E22\u1E26\u021E\u1E24\u1E28\u1E2A\u0126\u2C67\u2C75\uA78D]/g},
     {'base':'I', 'letters':/[\u0049\u24BE\uFF29\u00CC\u00CD\u00CE\u0128\u012A\u012C\u0130\u00CF\u1E2E\u1EC8\u01CF\u0208\u020A\u1ECA\u012E\u1E2C\u0197]/g},
     {'base':'J', 'letters':/[\u004A\u24BF\uFF2A\u0134\u0248]/g},
     {'base':'K', 'letters':/[\u004B\u24C0\uFF2B\u1E30\u01E8\u1E32\u0136\u1E34\u0198\u2C69\uA740\uA742\uA744\uA7A2]/g},
     {'base':'L', 'letters':/[\u004C\u24C1\uFF2C\u013F\u0139\u013D\u1E36\u1E38\u013B\u1E3C\u1E3A\u0141\u023D\u2C62\u2C60\uA748\uA746\uA780]/g},
     {'base':'LJ','letters':/[\u01C7]/g},
     {'base':'Lj','letters':/[\u01C8]/g},
     {'base':'M', 'letters':/[\u004D\u24C2\uFF2D\u1E3E\u1E40\u1E42\u2C6E\u019C]/g},
     {'base':'N', 'letters':/[\u004E\u24C3\uFF2E\u01F8\u0143\u00D1\u1E44\u0147\u1E46\u0145\u1E4A\u1E48\u0220\u019D\uA790\uA7A4]/g},
     {'base':'NJ','letters':/[\u01CA]/g},
     {'base':'Nj','letters':/[\u01CB]/g},
     {'base':'O', 'letters':/[\u004F\u24C4\uFF2F\u00D2\u00D3\u00D4\u1ED2\u1ED0\u1ED6\u1ED4\u00D5\u1E4C\u022C\u1E4E\u014C\u1E50\u1E52\u014E\u022E\u0230\u00D6\u022A\u1ECE\u0150\u01D1\u020C\u020E\u01A0\u1EDC\u1EDA\u1EE0\u1EDE\u1EE2\u1ECC\u1ED8\u01EA\u01EC\u00D8\u01FE\u0186\u019F\uA74A\uA74C]/g},
     {'base':'OI','letters':/[\u01A2]/g},
     {'base':'OO','letters':/[\uA74E]/g},
     {'base':'OU','letters':/[\u0222]/g},
     {'base':'P', 'letters':/[\u0050\u24C5\uFF30\u1E54\u1E56\u01A4\u2C63\uA750\uA752\uA754]/g},
     {'base':'Q', 'letters':/[\u0051\u24C6\uFF31\uA756\uA758\u024A]/g},
     {'base':'R', 'letters':/[\u0052\u24C7\uFF32\u0154\u1E58\u0158\u0210\u0212\u1E5A\u1E5C\u0156\u1E5E\u024C\u2C64\uA75A\uA7A6\uA782]/g},
     {'base':'S', 'letters':/[\u0053\u24C8\uFF33\u1E9E\u015A\u1E64\u015C\u1E60\u0160\u1E66\u1E62\u1E68\u0218\u015E\u2C7E\uA7A8\uA784]/g},
     {'base':'T', 'letters':/[\u0054\u24C9\uFF34\u1E6A\u0164\u1E6C\u021A\u0162\u1E70\u1E6E\u0166\u01AC\u01AE\u023E\uA786]/g},
     {'base':'TZ','letters':/[\uA728]/g},
     {'base':'U', 'letters':/[\u0055\u24CA\uFF35\u00D9\u00DA\u00DB\u0168\u1E78\u016A\u1E7A\u016C\u00DC\u01DB\u01D7\u01D5\u01D9\u1EE6\u016E\u0170\u01D3\u0214\u0216\u01AF\u1EEA\u1EE8\u1EEE\u1EEC\u1EF0\u1EE4\u1E72\u0172\u1E76\u1E74\u0244]/g},
     {'base':'V', 'letters':/[\u0056\u24CB\uFF36\u1E7C\u1E7E\u01B2\uA75E\u0245]/g},
     {'base':'VY','letters':/[\uA760]/g},
     {'base':'W', 'letters':/[\u0057\u24CC\uFF37\u1E80\u1E82\u0174\u1E86\u1E84\u1E88\u2C72]/g},
     {'base':'X', 'letters':/[\u0058\u24CD\uFF38\u1E8A\u1E8C]/g},
     {'base':'Y', 'letters':/[\u0059\u24CE\uFF39\u1EF2\u00DD\u0176\u1EF8\u0232\u1E8E\u0178\u1EF6\u1EF4\u01B3\u024E\u1EFE]/g},
     {'base':'Z', 'letters':/[\u005A\u24CF\uFF3A\u0179\u1E90\u017B\u017D\u1E92\u1E94\u01B5\u0224\u2C7F\u2C6B\uA762]/g},
     {'base':'a', 'letters':/[\u0061\u24D0\uFF41\u1E9A\u00E0\u00E1\u00E2\u1EA7\u1EA5\u1EAB\u1EA9\u00E3\u0101\u0103\u1EB1\u1EAF\u1EB5\u1EB3\u0227\u01E1\u00E4\u01DF\u1EA3\u00E5\u01FB\u01CE\u0201\u0203\u1EA1\u1EAD\u1EB7\u1E01\u0105\u2C65\u0250]/g},
     {'base':'aa','letters':/[\uA733]/g},
     {'base':'ae','letters':/[\u00E6\u01FD\u01E3]/g},
     {'base':'ao','letters':/[\uA735]/g},
     {'base':'au','letters':/[\uA737]/g},
     {'base':'av','letters':/[\uA739\uA73B]/g},
     {'base':'ay','letters':/[\uA73D]/g},
     {'base':'b', 'letters':/[\u0062\u24D1\uFF42\u1E03\u1E05\u1E07\u0180\u0183\u0253]/g},
     {'base':'c', 'letters':/[\u0063\u24D2\uFF43\u0107\u0109\u010B\u010D\u00E7\u1E09\u0188\u023C\uA73F\u2184]/g},
     {'base':'d', 'letters':/[\u0064\u24D3\uFF44\u1E0B\u010F\u1E0D\u1E11\u1E13\u1E0F\u0111\u018C\u0256\u0257\uA77A]/g},
     {'base':'dz','letters':/[\u01F3\u01C6]/g},
     {'base':'e', 'letters':/[\u0065\u24D4\uFF45\u00E8\u00E9\u00EA\u1EC1\u1EBF\u1EC5\u1EC3\u1EBD\u0113\u1E15\u1E17\u0115\u0117\u00EB\u1EBB\u011B\u0205\u0207\u1EB9\u1EC7\u0229\u1E1D\u0119\u1E19\u1E1B\u0247\u025B\u01DD]/g},
     {'base':'f', 'letters':/[\u0066\u24D5\uFF46\u1E1F\u0192\uA77C]/g},
     {'base':'g', 'letters':/[\u0067\u24D6\uFF47\u01F5\u011D\u1E21\u011F\u0121\u01E7\u0123\u01E5\u0260\uA7A1\u1D79\uA77F]/g},
     {'base':'h', 'letters':/[\u0068\u24D7\uFF48\u0125\u1E23\u1E27\u021F\u1E25\u1E29\u1E2B\u1E96\u0127\u2C68\u2C76\u0265]/g},
     {'base':'hv','letters':/[\u0195]/g},
     {'base':'i', 'letters':/[\u0069\u24D8\uFF49\u00EC\u00ED\u00EE\u0129\u012B\u012D\u00EF\u1E2F\u1EC9\u01D0\u0209\u020B\u1ECB\u012F\u1E2D\u0268\u0131]/g},
     {'base':'j', 'letters':/[\u006A\u24D9\uFF4A\u0135\u01F0\u0249]/g},
     {'base':'k', 'letters':/[\u006B\u24DA\uFF4B\u1E31\u01E9\u1E33\u0137\u1E35\u0199\u2C6A\uA741\uA743\uA745\uA7A3]/g},
     {'base':'l', 'letters':/[\u006C\u24DB\uFF4C\u0140\u013A\u013E\u1E37\u1E39\u013C\u1E3D\u1E3B\u017F\u0142\u019A\u026B\u2C61\uA749\uA781\uA747]/g},
     {'base':'lj','letters':/[\u01C9]/g},
     {'base':'m', 'letters':/[\u006D\u24DC\uFF4D\u1E3F\u1E41\u1E43\u0271\u026F]/g},
     {'base':'n', 'letters':/[\u006E\u24DD\uFF4E\u01F9\u0144\u00F1\u1E45\u0148\u1E47\u0146\u1E4B\u1E49\u019E\u0272\u0149\uA791\uA7A5]/g},
     {'base':'nj','letters':/[\u01CC]/g},
     {'base':'o', 'letters':/[\u006F\u24DE\uFF4F\u00F2\u00F3\u00F4\u1ED3\u1ED1\u1ED7\u1ED5\u00F5\u1E4D\u022D\u1E4F\u014D\u1E51\u1E53\u014F\u022F\u0231\u00F6\u022B\u1ECF\u0151\u01D2\u020D\u020F\u01A1\u1EDD\u1EDB\u1EE1\u1EDF\u1EE3\u1ECD\u1ED9\u01EB\u01ED\u00F8\u01FF\u0254\uA74B\uA74D\u0275]/g},
     {'base':'oi','letters':/[\u01A3]/g},
     {'base':'ou','letters':/[\u0223]/g},
     {'base':'oo','letters':/[\uA74F]/g},
     {'base':'p','letters':/[\u0070\u24DF\uFF50\u1E55\u1E57\u01A5\u1D7D\uA751\uA753\uA755]/g},
     {'base':'q','letters':/[\u0071\u24E0\uFF51\u024B\uA757\uA759]/g},
     {'base':'r','letters':/[\u0072\u24E1\uFF52\u0155\u1E59\u0159\u0211\u0213\u1E5B\u1E5D\u0157\u1E5F\u024D\u027D\uA75B\uA7A7\uA783]/g},
     {'base':'s','letters':/[\u0073\u24E2\uFF53\u00DF\u015B\u1E65\u015D\u1E61\u0161\u1E67\u1E63\u1E69\u0219\u015F\u023F\uA7A9\uA785\u1E9B]/g},
     {'base':'t','letters':/[\u0074\u24E3\uFF54\u1E6B\u1E97\u0165\u1E6D\u021B\u0163\u1E71\u1E6F\u0167\u01AD\u0288\u2C66\uA787]/g},
     {'base':'tz','letters':/[\uA729]/g},
     {'base':'u','letters':/[\u0075\u24E4\uFF55\u00F9\u00FA\u00FB\u0169\u1E79\u016B\u1E7B\u016D\u00FC\u01DC\u01D8\u01D6\u01DA\u1EE7\u016F\u0171\u01D4\u0215\u0217\u01B0\u1EEB\u1EE9\u1EEF\u1EED\u1EF1\u1EE5\u1E73\u0173\u1E77\u1E75\u0289]/g},
     {'base':'v','letters':/[\u0076\u24E5\uFF56\u1E7D\u1E7F\u028B\uA75F\u028C]/g},
     {'base':'vy','letters':/[\uA761]/g},
     {'base':'w','letters':/[\u0077\u24E6\uFF57\u1E81\u1E83\u0175\u1E87\u1E85\u1E98\u1E89\u2C73]/g},
     {'base':'x','letters':/[\u0078\u24E7\uFF58\u1E8B\u1E8D]/g},
     {'base':'y','letters':/[\u0079\u24E8\uFF59\u1EF3\u00FD\u0177\u1EF9\u0233\u1E8F\u00FF\u1EF7\u1E99\u1EF5\u01B4\u024F\u1EFF]/g},
     {'base':'z','letters':/[\u007A\u24E9\uFF5A\u017A\u1E91\u017C\u017E\u1E93\u1E95\u01B6\u0225\u0240\u2C6C\uA763]/g}
   ];
 
   for(var i=0; i<defaultDiacriticsRemovalMap.length; i++) {
     str = str.replace(defaultDiacriticsRemovalMap[i].letters, defaultDiacriticsRemovalMap[i].base);
   }
   
   str = str.replace(/&amp;/g,"&");
 
   return str;
 
 }
 function searchDatabase() {
     // Declare variables
     var inputInner, inputOuter, filter, ul, li, a, i, beanCounter, hideOrShow;
 	inputOuter = document.getElementById('myInputOuter');
     inputInner = document.getElementById('myInputInner');
 	hideOrShow = document.getElementById('searchResults');
 	
     filter = inputInner.value.toUpperCase();
     ul = document.getElementById("myUL");
     li = ul.getElementsByTagName('li');
 
     // Loop through all list items, and hide those who don't match the search query
 	beanCounter = 0;
     for (i = 0; i < li.length; i++) {
         dbName = li[i].getElementsByClassName("dbName")[0];
 		dbLocation = li[i].getElementsByClassName("dbLocation")[0];
 		dbCategory = li[i].getElementsByClassName("dbCategory")[0];
 		var evaluate = removeDiacritics(dbName.innerHTML).toUpperCase();
 		var evaluate2 = removeDiacritics(dbLocation.innerHTML).toUpperCase();
 		var evaluate3 = removeDiacritics(dbCategory.innerHTML).toUpperCase();
 		//alert("searchDatabase function: " + evaluate + " >> " + filter);
         if ((evaluate.indexOf(filter) > -1) || (evaluate2.indexOf(filter) > -1) || (evaluate3.indexOf(filter) > -1)) 
 		{
             li[i].style.display = "";
 			beanCounter = beanCounter + 1;
         } else {
             li[i].style.display = "none";
         }
     }
 	
 
 	if ((beanCounter > 0) && (inputInner.value != ''))
 	{
 		noResult.style.display = "none";		
 		$('#searchResults').fadeIn();		
 		inputInner.focus;
 	} else {
 		inputOuter.value = inputInner.value;
 		if (inputOuter.value != '')
 		{
 			noResult.style.display = "inline";
 		} else
 		{
 			noResult.style.display = "none";
 		}		
 		$('#searchResults').fadeOut();
 		InputOuter.focus;
 	}
 }
 
 function searchDatabaseOuter() {
     // Declare variables
     var inputInner, inputOuter, filter, ul, li, a, i, beanCounter, hideOrShow;
     inputOuter = document.getElementById('myInputOuter');
 	inputInner = document.getElementById('myInputInner');
 	hideOrShow = document.getElementById('searchResults');
 	noResult   = document.getElementById('noResult');
 	bannerOuter = document.getElementById('bannerOuter');
     filter = inputOuter.value.toUpperCase();
     ul = document.getElementById("myUL");
     li = ul.getElementsByTagName('li');
 	
 
     // Loop through all list items, and hide those who don't match the search query
 	beanCounter = 0;
     for (i = 0; i < li.length; i++) {
         dbName = li[i].getElementsByClassName("dbName")[0];
 		dbLocation = li[i].getElementsByClassName("dbLocation")[0];
 		dbCategory = li[i].getElementsByClassName("dbCategory")[0];		
 		var evaluate = removeDiacritics(dbName.innerHTML).toUpperCase();
 		var evaluate2 = removeDiacritics(dbLocation.innerHTML).toUpperCase();
 		var evaluate3 = removeDiacritics(dbCategory.innerHTML).toUpperCase();		
 		//alert("searchDatabase function: " + evaluate + " >> " + filter);
         if ((evaluate.indexOf(filter) > -1) || (evaluate2.indexOf(filter) > -1) || (evaluate3.indexOf(filter) > -1)) 
 		{
             li[i].style.display = "";
 			beanCounter = beanCounter + 1;
         } else {
             li[i].style.display = "none";
         }
     }
 	
 
 	if ((beanCounter > 0) && (inputOuter.value != ''))
 	{
 		inputInner.value = inputOuter.value;
 		noResult.style.display = "none";
 		$('#searchResults').fadeIn();
 	} else {
 		if (inputOuter.value != '')
 		{
             bannerOuter.style.display = "none";
 			noResult.style.display = "inline";
 		} else
 		{
 			noResult.style.display = "none";
 			bannerOuter.style.display = "block";
 		}
 			
 		$('#searchResults').fadeOut();
 		
 	}
 }
 
 function searchDatabaseMobile() {
     // Declare variables
     var inputInner, filter, ul, li, a, i, beanCounter, hideOrShow;
     inputInner = document.getElementById('myInputInnerMobile');
 	hideOrShow = document.getElementById('searchResultsMobile');
 	noResult   = document.getElementById('noResultMobile');	
     filter = inputInner.value.toUpperCase();
     ul = document.getElementById("myULMobile");
     li = ul.getElementsByTagName('li');
 
     // Loop through all list items, and hide those who don't match the search query
 	beanCounter = 0;
     for (i = 0; i < li.length; i++) {
         dbName = li[i].getElementsByClassName("dbName")[0];
 		dbLocation = li[i].getElementsByClassName("dbLocation")[0];
 		dbCategory = li[i].getElementsByClassName("dbCategory")[0];
 		var evaluate = removeDiacritics(dbName.innerHTML).toUpperCase();
 		var evaluate2 = removeDiacritics(dbLocation.innerHTML).toUpperCase();
 		var evaluate3 = removeDiacritics(dbCategory.innerHTML).toUpperCase();
 		//alert("searchDatabase function: " + evaluate + " >> " + filter);
         if ((evaluate.indexOf(filter) > -1) || (evaluate2.indexOf(filter) > -1) || (evaluate3.indexOf(filter) > -1)) 
 		{
             li[i].style.display = "";
 			beanCounter = beanCounter + 1;
         } else {
             li[i].style.display = "none";
         }
     }
 	
 }
   </script>
   <!--[if IE]><script type="text/javascript" src="excanvas.js"></script><![endif]-->
   <script>
    $(document).ready(function(){
    $('#banner_image').bind('contextmenu',function() { return false; });
 });
 
 $(document).ready(function(){
 	
 	//Check to see if the window is top if not then display button
 	$(window).scroll(function(){
 		if ($(this).scrollTop() > 100) {
 			$('.scrollToTop').fadeIn();
 		} else {
 			$('.scrollToTop').fadeOut();
 		}
 	});
 	
 	//Click event to scroll to top
 	$('.scrollToTop').click(function(){
 		$('html, body').animate({scrollTop : 0},800);
 		return false;
 	});
 	
 });
 
 $(window).load(function(){
         $("#mobile_menu_button,#mobile_menu_button_close").click(function () {
             $("#mobile_menu_div").toggle("slow");
 			$("#container_new").toggle("slow");
 			
 			var query = $('#mobile_menu_button');
 			 
 			// check if element is Visible
 			var isVisible = query.is(':visible');
 			 
 			if (isVisible === true) {
 			   $("#mobile_menu_button").fadeOut();
 			   $("#mobile_menu_button_close").fadeIn();
 			} else {
 			   $("#mobile_menu_button").fadeIn();
 			   $("#mobile_menu_button_close").fadeOut();
 			}			
 			
         });
     });
 
 var windowsize = $(window).width();

       var windowYOffset = window.pageYOffset,
           elBackgrounPos = "50% " + (windowYOffset * speed) + "px";
 
       el.style.backgroundPosition = elBackgrounPos;

 /* SCROLL FUNCTION */

 /*	            top	    not top
 < 1300 pixels	small	small
 > 1300 pixels	big	    small
 */
 
 function mobileSettings() {
 	//alert ('within function');
 		windowsize = $(window).width();
 	 
 		/*if <=80 and < 1300
 		if <=80 and >= 1300
 		if > 80 and < 1300
 		if > 80 and >= 1300	 */
 		
 		// banner transparent (menu)
 		// banner image (gros morne photo)
 		// menu links (menu)
 		// logo image (vking trail ship)
 		// banner white (contains search)
 	 
  		if (($(window).scrollTop() <= 80) && (windowsize < 1150)) {	        /* TOP OF PAGE >> LESS THAN 1300 WIDE */
 
 		 $('#banner_transparent').css('top','0px');
 		 $('#banner_transparent').css('background-color','#ffffff');
 		 $('#banner_transparent').css('box-shadow','1px 0px 1px gray');
 		 $('#banner_image').css('top','0px');
 		 $('#menu_links').css('top','0px');
 		 $('#logo_image').css('width','70px');	
 		 $('#logo_image').css('height','70px');	
          $('#banner_white').fadeOut();
 		 $('#NFLD').show;
 		 $('#youtube').css('margin-top','60px');
 		 
 		 	var query = $('#mobile_menu_button');
 			var query2 = $('#mobile_menu_button_close');
 			 
 			// check if element is Visible
 			var isVisible = query.is(':visible');
 			var isVisible2 = query2.is(':visible');
 			 
 			if ((isVisible === false) && (isVisible2 === false) && (windowsize < 1150)) {
 			   $("#mobile_menu_button").show();
 			}
 			
 			if (windowsize > 1150)
 			{
 				$("#mobile_menu_button").fadeOut();
 				$("#mobile_menu_button_back").fadeOut();
 			}
 						 
 	 
 		 		 	 
 		 
      } else if (($(window).scrollTop() <= 80) && (windowsize >= 1150)) {	/* TOP OF PAGE >> MORE THAN 1300 WIDE */
 
 		 $('#banner_transparent').css('top','80px');
 		 $('#banner_transparent').css('background-color','rgba(255,255,255,0.85)');	
 		 $('#banner_transparent').css('box-shadow','none');		
 		 $('#banner_image').css('top','0px');		 	 	 
 		 $('#menu_links').css('top','80px');
 		 if (windowsize >= 1365)
 		 {
 			 $('#logo_image').css('width','165px');	
 			 $('#logo_image').css('height','165px');	
 		 } else 
 		 {
 			 $('#logo_image').css('width','115px');	
 			 $('#logo_image').css('height','115px');	
 		 }
          $('#banner_white').show();	 
 		 $('#NFLD').show();		 
 		 $('#youtube').css('margin-top','0px');		 		
 		 $('#mobile_menu_button').fadeOut();
 		 $('#mobile_menu_button_close').fadeOut();	
 		 $('#container_new').show(); 	 
 		 	 	 
      } else if (($(window).scrollTop() > 80) && (windowsize < 1150)) {      /* NOT TOP OF PAGE >> LESS THAN 1300 WIDE */
 
 		 $('#banner_transparent').css('top','0px');
 		 $('#banner_transparent').css('background-color','#ffffff');
 		 $('#banner_transparent').css('box-shadow','1px 0px 1px gray');
 		 $('#banner_image').css('top','0px');		 
 		 $('#menu_links').css('top','0px');
 		 $('#logo_image').css('width','70px');	
 		 $('#logo_image').css('height','70px');	
          $('#banner_white').hide();
 		 $('#youtube').css('margin-top','60px');		 
 		 
 		 	var query = $('#mobile_menu_button');
 			var query = $('#mobile_menu_button_close');
 			 
 			// check if element is Visible
 			var isVisible = query.is(':visible');
 			var isVisible2 = query.is(':visible');
 			 
 			if ((isVisible === false) && (isVisible2 === false) && (windowsize <= 1150)) {
 			   $("#mobile_menu_button").show();
 			}	
 			if (windowsize > 1150)
 			{
 				$("#mobile_menu_button").fadeOut();
 				$("#mobile_menu_button_back").fadeOut();				
 			}
 
 		 
 		 	
 	 } else if (($(window).scrollTop() > 80) && (windowsize >= 1150)) {     /* NOT TOP OF PAGE >> MORE THAN 1300 WIDE */
 
 		 $('#banner_transparent').css('top','0px');
 		 $('#banner_transparent').css('background-color','#ffffff');
 		 $('#banner_transparent').css('box-shadow','1px 0px 1px gray');
 		 $('#banner_image').css('top','0px');		 
 		 $('#menu_links').css('top','0px');
 		 $('#logo_image').css('top','0px');	
 		 $('#logo_image').css('width','70px');	
 		 $('#logo_image').css('height','70px');
          $('#banner_white').fadeOut();
 		 $('#NFLD').hide();		 
 		 $('#youtube').css('margin-top','60px');		 
 		 $('#mobile_menu_button').fadeOut();
 		 $('#mobile_menu_button_close').fadeOut();		
 		 $('#container_new').show(); 
 	 }
 	 
 	 if (windowsize > 1150) {
 		$('#mobile_menu_div').fadeOut();
 	 }
 	 
 	 if (windowsize > 567) {
 		 $('#youtube').css('pointer-events','none');
 	 } else
 	 {
 		 $('#youtube').css('pointer-events','auto');
 	 }
 	 
 	
 }
 
 $(window).bind('scroll', function() { mobileSettings() });
 $(window).resize(function () { mobileSettings() });
 $(window).load(function () { mobileSettings() });
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    function getCookie(cname) {
     var name = cname + "=";
     var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
     for(var i=0; i<ca.length; i++) {
         var c = ca[i];
         while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1);
         if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
     }
     return "";
 }
 
 function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
     var d = new Date();
     d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
     var expires = "expires="+d.toUTCString();
     document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + "; " + expires;
 }
 
 function initialize_video() {
 	load_div2('home.php','map_canvas');
 }
 function wait(ms){
    var start = new Date().getTime();
    var end = start;
    while(end < start + ms) {
      end = new Date().getTime();
   }
 }
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    //google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, 'load', initialize_video());
 google.maps.event.addDomListener(window, "resize", resize_map());
 
 function resize_map () {
 	if (window.result != null)
 	{
 		var delay=500; // 1 seconds
 		setTimeout(function(){
 				  window.map.setCenter(window.result);
 				  window.map.fitBounds(window.result2);
 		},delay); 
 	}
 }
 
 function draggable_div()
 {
 	$("#right_index_box").data({
     'originalLeft': $("#right_index_box").css('left'),
     'origionalTop': $("#right_index_box").css('top')
 	});
 	$( "#right_index_box" ).draggable({ containment: '#map_canvas' });
 }
 function reset_box_position()
 {
 		$("#right_index_box").css({
 			'left': $("#right_index_box").data('originalLeft'),
 			'top': $("#right_index_box").data('origionalTop')
 		});	
 }
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    function urlcoding(id)
 	{
 		var ele = document.getElementById(id).value;
 		return encodeURIComponent(ele);	
 	}
 
 	function set_toggle_switch()
 	{
 		//alert('set_toggle_switch');
 		window.allowOnchange = 'N';
 		$('#basic.demo input').switchButton();
 		$("#grid_map_toggle").switchButton({
 			on_label: 'Map View',  
 			off_label: 'Grid View'
 		});	
 		window.allowOnchange = 'Y';			
 	}
 
 
 	function set_map_or_grid(checked)
 	{
 		var href = document.location.href;
 		var lastPathSegment = href.substr(href.lastIndexOf('/') + 1);
 
 		window.allowOnchange = "Y";
 		//alert('allow: ' + window.allowOnchange);
 	
 		//alert(window.category);
 		if (window.allowOnchange == 'Y')
 		{
 			
 //			if (window.category == 'about')
 //			{
 //				//alert('common-begin 151 - set to accommodations');
 //				window.category = 'accommodations';
 //			}
 			
 			if (!(checked))
 			{
 			//alert(window.province);
 				//alert(window.category);			
 				window.mapmode = 'grid';
 				$('#map_canvas').height('auto');
 				
 				
 				
 				if (lastPathSegment == 'accommodations.php')
 				{
 					load_div('details_ALL.php?PROVINCE=' + window.province 
 			+ '&CATEGORY=' + window.category 
 			+ '&checkboxMotelsHotels=' + document.getElementById('checkboxMotelsHotels').checked
 			+ '&checkboxBedBreakfast=' + document.getElementById('checkboxBedBreakfast').checked
 			+ '&checkboxCottagesEfficiencies=' + document.getElementById('checkboxCottagesEfficiencies').checked
 			+ '&checkboxRVParksCampgrounds=' + document.getElementById('checkboxRVParksCampgrounds').checked
 			+ '&checkboxVacationRentalHomes=' + document.getElementById('checkboxVacationRentalHomes').checked
 			+ '&checkboxAdventureOutfitters=' + document.getElementById('checkboxAdventureOutfitters').checked        
 			+ '&checkboxSouth=' + document.getElementById('checkboxSouth').checked
 			+ '&checkboxWest=' + document.getElementById('checkboxWest').checked
 			+ '&checkboxEast=' + document.getElementById('checkboxEast').checked
 			+ '&checkboxNorth=' + document.getElementById('checkboxNorth').checked
 			,'map_canvas');
 				} else
 				{
 					load_div('details_ALL.php?PROVINCE=' + window.province 
 			+ '&CATEGORY=' + window.category 
 			+ '&checkboxSouth=' + document.getElementById('checkboxSouth').checked
 			+ '&checkboxWest=' + document.getElementById('checkboxWest').checked
 			+ '&checkboxEast=' + document.getElementById('checkboxEast').checked
 			+ '&checkboxNorth=' + document.getElementById('checkboxNorth').checked
 			,'map_canvas');
 				}
 	
 	
 				var ele=document.getElementById('right_index_box');
 				ele.style.display='none';
 			} else
 			{
 				//alert('common-begin 752 setting to map');
 				window.mapmode='map';
 				//alert('function set-map-or-grid');
 				load_map_by_province(window.province, window.category);
 			}
 		} else
 		{
 			//alert('could checkbox here');
 			
 
 						
 		}
 	}
 
     function setleftrightarrows ()
 	{	
 	
 		$(document).keydown(function(e) {
 			switch(e.which) {
 				
 				case 37: // left
 
 				if (($('#map_canvas2').is(":visible")) && ($('#photo_exists').is(":visible")))
 				{
 					setphotoprev();
 					e.preventDefault(); // prevent the default action (scroll / move caret)
 
 				} 
 				break;
 	
 				case 39: // right			
 				
 				if (($('#map_canvas2').is(":visible")) && ($('#photo_exists').is(":visible")))
 				{
 					setphotonext();
 					e.preventDefault(); // prevent the default action (scroll / move caret)				
 				} 
 				break;
 		
 				default: return; // exit this handler for other keys
 			}
 		});		
 	}
 	
 	function setmenucolor(tdset)
 	{
 		$('#home').css('background','none');	
 		$('#about').css('background','none');					
 		$('#communities').css('background','none');	
 		$('#accommodations').css('background','none');	
 		$('#restaurants').css('background','none');	
 		$('#attractions').css('background','none');	
 		$('#events').css('background','none');	
 		$('#francais').css('background','none');	
 		$('#advertise').css('background','none');	
 		$('#member').css('background','none');	
 		$('#postEvent').css('background','none');	
 		$('#favourites').css('background','none');	
 		$('#web_design').css('background','none');	
 		if (tdset == 'home')
 		{
 			var tdset = document.getElementById("home");
 		} else
 		{
 			var ele = document.getElementById("home");
 			ele.style.backgroundImage="url('Images/LEFT_COLUMN_FILLER.png')";
 		}
 		tdset.style.backgroundColor = '#8ab8cd';
 	}
 	
 	function setphotonext()
 	{	
 		if (window.galleryphoto == 9)
 		{
 			window.galleryphoto = 0;
 		}
 		window.galleryphoto = window.galleryphoto + 1;
 		//alert('next ' + window.galleryphoto);
 		
 		tdset = '#photo' + window.galleryphoto;
 		number = window.galleryphoto;
 		setphotochoiceimage(tdset,number)
 		
 	}
 	
 	function setphotoprev()
 	{	
 		if (window.galleryphoto == 1)
 		{
 			window.galleryphoto = 10;
 		}
 		window.galleryphoto = window.galleryphoto - 1;
 		//alert('prev ' + window.galleryphoto);
 		
 		tdset = '#photo' + window.galleryphoto;
 		number = window.galleryphoto;
 		setphotochoiceimage(tdset,number)
 	}		
 	
 	function setphotochoicecolor(tdset)
 	{	
 
 		$(tdset).css('background','#8ab8cd');
 
 	}
 	
 	function setphotochoicecolorB()
 	{
 		$('#photo1').css('background','#0d42b6');	
 		$('#photo1').css('color','#FFFFFF');	
 
 		$('#photo2').css('background','#0d42b6');	
 		$('#photo2').css('color','#FFFFFF');	
 						
 		$('#photo3').css('background','#0d42b6');
 		$('#photo3').css('color','#FFFFFF');	
 			
 		$('#photo4').css('background','#0d42b6');
 		$('#photo4').css('color','#FFFFFF');	
 			
 		$('#photo5').css('background','#0d42b6');	
 		$('#photo5').css('color','#FFFFFF');	
 		
 		$('#photo6').css('background','#0d42b6');	
 		$('#photo6').css('color','#FFFFFF');	
 		
 		$('#photo7').css('background','#0d42b6');	
 		$('#photo7').css('color','#FFFFFF');	
 		
 		$('#photo8').css('background','#0d42b6');	
 		$('#photo8').css('color','#FFFFFF');	
 		
 		$('#photo9').css('background','#0d42b6');
 		$('#photo9').css('color','#FFFFFF');	
 		
 	
 		$(window.photochosen).css('background','#FFFFFF');
 		$(window.photochosen).css('color','#0d42b6');	
 	}
 	
 	function setphotochoiceimage(tdset,number)
 	{	
 		previous = window.photochosen;
 		$(previous).css('background','#0d42b6');
 		$(previous).css('color','#FFFFFF');	
 			
 		window.photochosen = tdset;
 		$(window.photochosen).css('background','#FFFFFF');
 		$(window.photochosen).css('color','#0d42b6');
 		
 		if (number == 1)
 		{ var numberb = '';} else { var numberb = '_' + number;}
 		
 		var passed_file = '<br><img src="Images/' + window.idz + '_300' + numberb + '.jpg" width="99%" border="0" style="margin-right:10px;margin-bottom:10px;border-style:solid;border-width:1px;border-color:#AEAEAE;border-collapse:separate;box-shadow: 2px 2px 2px gray;" />';
 		
 		// var passed_file = "Images/town_saint_pierre_miquelon_300_2.jpg";
 		//alert(passed_file);
 		
 		$('#gallerycontainer').html(passed_file).fadeIn(3000);
 
 		//alert('should be done');	
 		
 		window.galleryphoto = Number(number);
 		
 	}	
 	function setmenucolorhome()
 	{
 		var ele = document.getElementById("home");
 		ele.style.backgroundColor = '#8ab8cd';
 	}
 	function MenuOnMouseIn(elem) {
 		elem.style.backgroundImage="url('Images/LEFT_COLUMN_FILLER_HOVER.png')";
 	}
 	function MenuOnMouseOut(elem) {
 		elem.style.backgroundImage= "";
 	}
