   <script>
    function load_map_by_province(province,category)
 {	
 		$.blockUI({ overlayCSS: { backgroundColor: '#cee8f4' } }); 
 		//alert('Prov: ' + province + ' --- Category:' + category + ' --- Mode:' + window.mapmode);
 		
 		if (!(window.mapmode == 'map' || window.mapmode == 'grid'))
 		{
 			window.province = province;
 			window.category = category;
 			window.mapmode = 'grid';
 		}
 		
 		if (window.mapmode == 'map')
 		{
 			//alert('google-map 944 setting to map');
 	
 			$('#basic.demo input').switchButton({checked:true});
 		
 		}	
 					
 		if(window.mapmode == 'grid')
 		{
 			var ele = document.getElementById("map_canvas2");
 			ele.style.display = "none";
 			var ele = document.getElementById("map_canvas3");
 			ele.style.display = "none";			
 			var ele = document.getElementById("map_canvas");
 			ele.style.display = "block";
 			$('#map_canvas').height('auto');
 			
 			window.oldid = '';
 			//load_div('details_ALL.php?PROVINCE=' + window.province + '&CATEGORY=' + window.category,'map_canvas');
 			
 			var href = document.location.href;
 		    var lastPathSegment = href.substr(href.lastIndexOf('/') + 1);
 
 			
 				if (lastPathSegment == 'accommodations.php')
 				{
 					load_div('details_ALL.php?PROVINCE=' + window.province 
 			+ '&CATEGORY=' + window.category 
 			+ '&checkboxMotelsHotels=' + document.getElementById('checkboxMotelsHotels').checked
 			+ '&checkboxBedBreakfast=' + document.getElementById('checkboxBedBreakfast').checked
 			+ '&checkboxCottagesEfficiencies=' + document.getElementById('checkboxCottagesEfficiencies').checked
 			+ '&checkboxRVParksCampgrounds=' + document.getElementById('checkboxRVParksCampgrounds').checked
 			+ '&checkboxVacationRentalHomes=' + document.getElementById('checkboxVacationRentalHomes').checked
 			+ '&checkboxAdventureOutfitters=' + document.getElementById('checkboxAdventureOutfitters').checked        
 			+ '&checkboxSouth=' + document.getElementById('checkboxSouth').checked
 			+ '&checkboxWest=' + document.getElementById('checkboxWest').checked
 			+ '&checkboxEast=' + document.getElementById('checkboxEast').checked
 			+ '&checkboxNorth=' + document.getElementById('checkboxNorth').checked
 			,'map_canvas');
 				} else
 				{
 					load_div('details_ALL.php?PROVINCE=' + window.province 
 			+ '&CATEGORY=' + window.category 
 			+ '&checkboxSouth=' + document.getElementById('checkboxSouth').checked
 			+ '&checkboxWest=' + document.getElementById('checkboxWest').checked
 			+ '&checkboxEast=' + document.getElementById('checkboxEast').checked
 			+ '&checkboxNorth=' + document.getElementById('checkboxNorth').checked
 			,'map_canvas');
 				}
 
 			
 
 			//alert(category);
 			if (category == null)
 			{
 				//alert('common_begin 390 - set to accommodations');
 				window.category = 'accommodations';
 				passed_file = "menu_province.php" + "?prov_selected=" + province;
 				target_div = "#left_menu";
 				jquery_ajax_load(passed_file,target_div);
 				$('#accommodations').css('background-color', '#8ab8cd');
 				set_toggle_switch();			
 				category = 'accommodations';
 					var ele = document.getElementById("home");
 					ele.style.backgroundImage="url('Images/LEFT_COLUMN_FILLER.png')";
 			} else if (category == "accommodations")
 			{
 				window.category = category;
 				set_toggle_switch();	
 			} else if (category == "restaurants")
 			{
 				window.category = category;
 				set_toggle_switch();
 			} else if (category == "attractions")
 			{
 				//alert('attractions');
 				window.category = category;
 				set_toggle_switch();	
 
 			}  else if (category == "communities")
 			{
 				window.category = category;
 			}  else if (category == "Tours")
 			{
 				window.category = category;
 				set_toggle_switch();
 			}  else if (category == "hikingTrails")
 			{
 				window.category = category;
 			}  else if (category == "about")
 			{
 				window.category = category;
 				passed_file = "menu_province.php" + "?prov_selected=" + province;
 				target_div = "#left_menu";
 				jquery_ajax_load(passed_file,target_div);
 				set_toggle_switch();				
 				
 				if      (province == 1) {var about_link = 'about_NB.php';}
 				else if (province == 2) {var about_link = 'about_NL.php';}
 				else if (province == 3) {var about_link = 'about_NS.php';}
 				else if (province == 4) {var about_link = 'about_PE.php';}
 				else if (province == 5) {var about_link = 'about_FR.php';}				
 				
 				jquery_ajax_load_b(about_link,'#map_canvas');
 				
 				var ele = document.getElementById('basic');
 				ele.style.display='none';
 								
 			} else if (category == "events")
 			{
 				window.category = category;
 				passed_file = "menu_province.php" + "?prov_selected=" + province;
 				target_div = "#left_menu";
 				jquery_ajax_load(passed_file,target_div);
 				set_toggle_switch();				
 				
 				if      (province == 1) {var events_link = 'events_NB.php';}
 				else if (province == 2) {var events_link = 'events_NL.php';}
 				else if (province == 3) {var events_link = 'events_NS.php';}
 				else if (province == 4) {var events_link = 'events_PE.php';}
 				else if (province == 5) {var events_link = 'events_FR.php';}				
 				
 				jquery_ajax_load_b(events_link,'#map_canvas');
 				
 				var ele = document.getElementById('basic');
 				ele.style.display='none';
 								
 			}
 			
 			
 		} else if (category == "about")
 		{		
 				$('#map_canvas').height('auto');
 				window.category = 'about';
 				passed_file = "menu_province.php" + "?prov_selected=" + province;
 				target_div = "#left_menu";
 				jquery_ajax_load(passed_file,target_div);
 				set_toggle_switch();			
 				
 				if      (province == 1) {var about_link = 'about_NB.php';}
 				else if (province == 2) {var about_link = 'about_NL.php';}
 				else if (province == 3) {var about_link = 'about_NS.php';}
 				else if (province == 4) {var about_link = 'about_PE.php';}
 				else if (province == 5) {var about_link = 'about_FR.php';}				
 				
 				jquery_ajax_load_b(about_link,'#map_canvas');
 				
 				var ele = document.getElementById('basic');
 				ele.style.display='none';
 		} else if (category == "events")
 		{		
 				$('#map_canvas').height('auto');
 				window.category = 'events';
 				passed_file = "menu_province.php" + "?prov_selected=" + province;
 				target_div = "#left_menu";
 				jquery_ajax_load(passed_file,target_div);
 				set_toggle_switch();			
 				
 				if      (province == 1) {var events_link = 'events_NB.php';}
 				else if (province == 2) {var events_link = 'events_NL.php';}
 				else if (province == 3) {var events_link = 'events_NS.php';}
 				else if (province == 4) {var events_link = 'events_PE.php';}
 				else if (province == 5) {var events_link = 'events_FR.php';}				
 				
 				jquery_ajax_load_b(events_link,'#map_canvas');
 				
 				var ele = document.getElementById('basic');
 				ele.style.display='none';
 				
 		} else
 		{
 			//alert('catch all');
 			var ele = document.getElementById("map_canvas2");
 			ele.style.display = "none";
 			var ele = document.getElementById("map_canvas3");
 			ele.style.display = "none";			
 			var ele = document.getElementById("map_canvas");
 			ele.style.display = "block";
 			//$('#map_canvas').height('84.3%');
 
 			window.province = province;
 			window.category = category;
 			var id = "map_canvas";
 			//alert('>>> ' + category);
 			initialize(province,category,id);
 			//alert('after initialize');
 			$('#basic.demo input').switchButton({checked:true});
 
 //			var ele = document.getElementById("province_picker");
 //			ele.blur();	
 			var ele = document.getElementById("right_index_box");		
 			if (ele != null) { ele.style.display = "none"; } 
 			$("#right_index_box").css({
 				'left': $("#right_index_box").data('originalLeft'),
 				'top': $("#right_index_box").data('origionalTop')
 			});	
 	
 		};
 		setTimeout($.unblockUI, 1000); 
 		
 }
 function remove_select_title()
 {	
 	// $("#province_picker option[value='0']").remove();
 }
 function reset_pp()
 {	
 	$("#province_picker option[value='0']").attr('selected','selected');
 }
 function valid(trigger)
 { 
 	if (trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		$.blockUI({ overlayCSS: { backgroundColor: '#cee8f4' } });
 	};
 	
 	var province = $('#province').val();
 	var category = $('#category').val();
 	var phone = $('#phone').val();
 	var x = 0;
 	
 	if (trigger == 'PROVINCE' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{	
 		if (province == 0)
 			{$('#province_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');x=1;}
 		else
 			{
 				$('#province_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#province_desc').html('');
 			};
 	};
 	
 	if (trigger == 'CATEGORY' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{		
 		if (category == 0)
 			{$('#category_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');x=1;}
 		else
 			{
 				$('#category_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#category_desc').html('');
 			};
 	};
 	
 	if (trigger == 'PHONE' || trigger == 'PHONEB' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 
 		var vphone = (validatePhone(phone));
 
 		if (phone == null || phone == 'Enter phone number' || phone == '' || vphone == false  )
 			{
 					if (trigger == 'PHONEB' || phone == null || phone == '')
 					{
 						$('#phone_error').html('');
 						$('#phone_desc').html('Enter business number (Ex. 800-555-5555)');
 						x=1;
 					} else
 					{
 						$('#phone_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');
 						$('#phone_desc').html('Enter business number (Ex. 800-555-5555)');
 						x=1;
 					}
 			}
 		else
 			{
 				$('#phone_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#phone_desc').html('');
 			};	
 	};
 	
 	if (x == 1 && trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		$('#main_error_msg').html('<font color="red"><strong>Please correct errors marked in red (above) and re-submit form</strong></font>');
 	} else
 	{
 		$('#main_error_msg').html('');
 	};
 		
 	if (x == 0 && trigger == 'GO')
 	{load_div('join_b.php?province=' + province + '&category=' + category + '&phone=' + phone,'map_canvas');setTimeout($.unblockUI, 300);  }
 	else
 	{setTimeout($.unblockUI, 0);};
 			
 		
 }
 function valid_page2(trigger)
 { 
 
 	if (trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		$.blockUI({ overlayCSS: { backgroundColor: '#cee8f4' } });
 	};
 	
 	var community = $('#community').val();
 	var business = $('#business').val();
 	var address = $('#address').val();
 	var postal = $('#postal').val();
 	var email = $('#email').val();
 	var local = $('#local').val();
 	var website = $('#website').val();
 	var localb = $('#localb').val();
 	var fax =  $('#fax').val();
 	var tollfree = $('#tollfree').val();
 	var latitude = $('#latitude').val();
 	var longitude = $('#longitude').val();
 	var couponCode = $('#couponCode').val();
 	
 	var x = 0;
 
 	if (trigger == 'COMMUNITY' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{	
 		if (community == null || community == '' || community == 'Enter community name')
 		{
 			if (trigger != 'GO')
 			{
 				$('#community_error').html('');x=1;$('#community_desc').html('Enter community name');
 			} else
 			{
 				$('#community_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');x=1;$('#community_desc').html('Enter community name');
 			}
 		} else
 			{
 				$('#community_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#community_desc').html('');
 			};
 	};
 	
 	if (trigger == 'BUSINESS' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{	
 		if (business == null || business == '' || business == 'Enter business name')
 		{
 			if (trigger != 'GO')
 			{
 				$('#business_error').html('');x=1;$('#business_desc').html('Enter business name');
 			} else
 			{
 				$('#business_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');x=1;$('#business_desc').html('Enter business name');				
 			}
 		} else
 			{
 				$('#business_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#business_desc').html('');
 			};
 	};
 	
 	if (trigger == 'ADDRESS' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		if (address == null || address == '' || address == 'Enter physical address')
 		{
 			if (trigger != 'GO')
 			{
 				$('#address_error').html('');x=1;$('#address_desc').html('Enter physical address (Ex. 1 Maple Lane)');
 			} else
 			{
 				$('#address_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');x=1;$('#address_desc').html('Enter physical address (Ex. 1 Maple Lane)');				
 			}
 		} else
 			{
 				$('#address_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#address_desc').html('');
 			};
 	};
 	
 	
 	if (trigger == 'POSTAL' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		var vpostal = (validatePostal('postal'));
 
 		if (postal == null || postal == '' || postal == 'Enter postal code' || vpostal == false )
 		{
 			if (trigger == 'POSTAL' || postal == null || postal == '' && trigger != 'GO')
 			{
 						$('#postal_error').html('');
 						$('#postal_desc').html('Enter Postal Code (Ex. E4S 4P7)');
 						x=1;			
 			} else
 			{
 						$('#postal_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');
 						$('#postal_desc').html('Enter Postal Code (Ex. E4S 4P7)');
 						x=1;
 			}
 		
 		} else
 			{
 					$('#postal_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 					$('#postal_desc').html('');
 			}
 	};
 	
 	if (trigger == 'EMAIL' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		var vemail = (isRFC822ValidEmail('email'));
 
 		if (email == null || email == '' || email == 'Enter email' || vemail == false )
 		{
 			if (trigger == 'EMAIL' || email == null || email == '' && trigger != 'GO')
 			{
 						$('#email_error').html('');
 						$('#email_desc').html('Enter email address');
 						x=1;			
 			} else
 			{
 						$('#email_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');
 						$('#email_desc').html('Enter email address');
 						x=1;
 			}
 		
 		} else
 			{
 					$('#email_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 					$('#email_desc').html('');
 			}
 	};	
 	
 	if (trigger == 'LOCAL' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 
 		var vlocal = (validatePhone(local));
 
 		if (local == null || local == 'Enter local number' || local == '' || vlocal == false  )
 			{
 					if (trigger == 'LOCAL' || local == null || local == '' && trigger != 'GO')
 					{
 						$('#local_error').html('');
 						$('#local_desc').html('Enter local phone (Ex. 902-555-5555)');
 						x=1;
 					} else
 					{
 						$('#local_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');
 						$('#local_desc').html('Enter local phone (Ex. 902-555-5555)');
 						x=1;
 					}
 			}
 		else
 			{
 				$('#local_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#local_desc').html('');
 			};	
 	};
 	
 	if (trigger == 'WEBSITE' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		var vwebsite = (is_valid_url(website));
 
 		if (vwebsite == false && trigger == 'GO' && website != '' && website != 'Enter website URL')
 		{
 						$('#website_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');
 						$('#website_desc').html('');
 						x=1;
 		} else if (vwebsite == false)
 		{
 						$('#website_error').html('');
 						$('#website_desc').html('Enter website URL (Ex. www.yoursite.com)');
 						if (website == '' && trigger == 'GO')
 						{
 							$('#website').val('Enter website URL');
 							$('#website_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 						} else if (website != '' && trigger == 'GO')
 							{
 								$('#website_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 							}
 		} else
 		{
 				$('#website_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#website_desc').html('');		
 		}		
 	};	
 	
 	if (trigger == 'LOCALB' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		var vlocalb = (validatePhone(localb));
 
 		if (vlocalb == false && trigger == 'GO' && localb != '' && localb != 'Enter alternate phone')
 		{
 						$('#localb_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');
 						$('#localb_desc').html('');
 						x=1;
 		} else if (vlocalb == false)
 		{
 						$('#localb_error').html('');
 						$('#localb_desc').html('Enter alternative phone (Ex. 902-555-5555)');
 						if (localb == '' && trigger == 'GO')
 						{
 							$('#localb').val('Enter alternate phone');
 							$('#localb_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 						} else if (localb != '' && trigger == 'GO')
 							{
 								$('#localb_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 							}					
 		} else
 		{
 				$('#localb_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#localb_desc').html('');		
 		}
 	};		
 
 	if (trigger == 'FAX' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		var vfax = (validatePhone(fax));
 
 		if (vfax == false && trigger == 'GO' && fax != '' && fax != 'Enter fax number')
 		{
 						$('#fax_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');
 						$('#fax_desc').html('');
 						x=1;
 		} else if (vfax == false)
 		{
 						$('#fax_error').html('');
 						$('#fax_desc').html('Enter fax number (Ex. 902-666-6666)');
 						if (fax == '' && trigger == 'GO')
 						{
 							$('#fax').val('Enter fax number');
 							$('#fax_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 						} else if (fax != '' && trigger == 'GO')
 							{
 								$('#fax_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 							}						
 		} else
 		{
 				$('#fax_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#fax_desc').html('');		
 		}
 	};
 	
 	if (trigger == 'TOLLFREE' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		var vtollfree = (validatePhone(tollfree));
 
 		if (vtollfree == false && trigger == 'GO' && tollfree != '' && tollfree != 'Enter toll free phone')
 		{
 						$('#tollfree_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');
 						$('#tollfree_desc').html('');
 						x=1;
 		} else if (vtollfree == false)
 		{
 						$('#tollfree_error').html('');
 						$('#tollfree_desc').html('Enter  toll free number (Ex. 800-111-1111)');
 						if (tollfree == '' && trigger == 'GO')
 						{
 							$('#tollfree').val('Enter toll free phone');
 							$('#tollfree_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 						} else if (tollfree != '' && trigger == 'GO')
 							{
 								$('#tollfree_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 							}					
 		} else
 		{
 				$('#tollfree_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#tollfree_desc').html('');		
 		}
 	};	
 	
 	if (trigger == 'LATITUDE' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		var vlatitude = (validateLatitude(latitude));
 
 		if (vlatitude == false && trigger == 'GO' && latitude != '' && latitude != 'Enter latitude')
 		{
 						$('#latitude_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');
 						$('#latitude_desc').html('');
 						x=1;
 		} else if (vlatitude == false)
 		{
 						$('#latitude_error').html('');
 						$('#latitude_desc').html('Enter GPS Latitude coordinates (Ex. 51.000704)');
 						if (latitude == '' && trigger == 'GO')
 						{
 							$('#latitude').val('Enter latitude');
 							$('#latitude_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 						} else if (latitude != '' && trigger == 'GO')
 							{
 								$('#latitude_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 							}						
 		} else
 		{
 				$('#latitude_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#latitude_desc').html('');		
 		}
 	};	
 	
 	if (trigger == 'LONGITUDE' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		var vlongitude = (validateLongitude(longitude));
 
 		if (vlongitude == false && trigger == 'GO' && longitude != '' && longitude != 'Enter longitude')
 		{
 						$('#longitude_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');
 						$('#longitude_desc').html('');
 						x=1;
 		} else if (vlongitude == false)
 		{
 						$('#longitude_error').html('');
 						$('#longitude_desc').html('Enter GPS Longitude coordinates (Ex. -56.123456)');
 						if (longitude == '' && trigger == 'GO')
 						{
 							$('#longitude').val('Enter longitude');
 							$('#longitude_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 						} else if (longitude != '' && trigger == 'GO')
 							{
 								$('#longitude_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 							}					
 		} else
 		{
 				$('#longitude_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#longitude_desc').html('');		
 		}
 	};	
 	
 	if (trigger == 'COUPON_CODE' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		var vcouponCode = (validatecouponCode(couponCode));
 
 		if (vcouponCode == false && trigger == 'GO' && couponCode != '' && couponCode != 'Enter coupon code*')
 		{
 						$('#couponCode_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');
 						$('#couponCode_desc').html('');
 						x=1;
 		} else if (vcouponCode == false)
 		{
 						$('#couponCode_error').html('');
 						$('#couponCode_desc').html('Enter coupon code*');
 						if (couponCode == '' && trigger == 'GO')
 						{
 							$('#couponCode').val('Enter coupon code*');
 							$('#couponCode_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 						} else if (couponCode != '' && trigger == 'GO')
 							{
 								$('#couponCode_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 							}					
 		} else
 		{
 				$('#couponCode_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#couponCode_desc').html('');		
 		}
 	};
 	
 	if (x == 1 && trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		$('#main_error_msg_b').html('<font color="red"><strong>Please correct errors marked in red (above) and re-submit form</strong></font>');
 	} else
 	{
 		$('#main_error_msg_b').html('');
 	};		
 			
 	if (x == 0 && trigger == 'GO')
 	
 	{
 		var province = $('#province').val();
 		var category = $('#category').html();
 		var phone = $('#phone').html();
 			
 		var community = $('#community').val();
 		var business = $('#business').val();
 		var address = $('#address').val();
 		var postal = $('#postal').val();
 		var email = $('#email').val();
 		var local = $('#local').val();
 		
 		var website = $('#website').val();
 		if (website == 'Enter website URL') {website = null;};
 		var localb = $('#localb').val();
 		if (localb == 'Enter alternate phone') {localb = null;};		
 		var fax =  $('#fax').val();
 		if (fax == 'Enter fax number') {fax = null;};		
 		var tollfree = $('#tollfree').val();
 		if (tollfree == 'Enter toll free phone') {tollfree = null;};		
 		var latitude = $('#latitude').val();
 		if (latitude == 'Enter latitude') {latitude = null;};	
 		var longitude = $('#longitude').val();	
 		if (longitude == 'Enter longitude') {longitude = null;};
 		var couponCode = $('#couponCode').val();
 		if (couponCode == 'Enter coupon code*') {couponCode = null;};		
 				
 		load_div('join_c.php?province=' + province + '&category=' + category + '&phone=' + phone + '&community=' + community + '&business=' + business + '&address=' + address + '&postal=' + postal + '&email=' + email + '&local=' + local + '&website=' + website + '&localb=' + localb + '&fax=' + fax + '&tollfree=' + tollfree + '&latitude=' + latitude + '&longitude=' + longitude + '&couponCode=' + couponCode,'map_canvas');
 		setTimeout($.unblockUI, 300);  
 	} else
 	{
 		setTimeout($.unblockUI, 300);
 	};
 			
 		
 }
 function valid_events(trigger)
 { 
 	//alert(trigger);
 	if (trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		$.blockUI({ overlayCSS: { backgroundColor: '#cee8f4' } });
 	};
 	
 	var province = $('#province').val();
 	var title = $('#title').val();
 	var date = $('#date').val();
 	var time = $('#time').val();
 	var location = $('#location').val();
 	var website = $('#website').val();
 	var phone = $('#phone').val();
 	var description = $('#description').val();
 	var x = 0;
 	
 	if (trigger == 'PROVINCE' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{	
 		if (province == 0)
 			{$('#province_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');x=1;}
 		else
 			{
 				$('#province_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#province_desc').html('');
 			};
 	};
 	
 	if (trigger == 'TITLE' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{	
 		if (title == null || title == '' || title == 'Enter event title')
 		{
 			if (trigger != 'GO')
 			{
 				$('#title_error').html('');x=1;$('#title_desc').html('Enter event title');
 			} else
 			{
 				$('#title_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');x=1;$('#title_desc').html('Enter event title');				
 			}
 		} else
 			{
 				$('#title_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#title_desc').html('');
 			};
 	};
 	
 	if (trigger == 'DATE' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{	
 		if (date == null || date == '' || date == 'Enter event date')
 		{
 			if (trigger != 'GO')
 			{
 				$('#date_error').html('');x=1;$('#date_desc').html('Enter event date');
 			} else
 			{
 				$('#date_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');x=1;$('#date_desc').html('Enter event date');				
 			}
 		} else
 			{
 				$('#date_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#date_desc').html('');
 			};
 	};	
 	
 	if (trigger == 'LOCATION' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{	
 		if (location == null || location == '' || location == 'Enter event location')
 		{
 			if (trigger != 'GO')
 			{
 				$('#location_error').html('');x=1;$('#location_desc').html('Enter event location');
 			} else
 			{
 				$('#location_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');x=1;$('#location_desc').html('Enter event location');				
 			}
 		} else
 			{
 				$('#location_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#location_desc').html('');
 			};
 	};	
 	
 	if (trigger == 'DESCRIPTION' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{	
 		if (description == null || description == '' || description == 'Enter event description')
 		{
 			if (trigger != 'GO')
 			{
 				$('#description_error').html('');x=1;$('#description_desc').html('Enter event description');
 			} else
 			{
 				$('#description_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');x=1;$('#description_desc').html('Enter event description');				
 			}
 		} else
 			{
 				$('#description_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#description_desc').html('');
 			};
 	};
 	
 	
 	if (trigger == 'TIME' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 
 		$('#time_error').html('');
 		$('#time_desc').html('Enter event time (Ex. 8:00 pm - 10:00 pm)');
 		if (time == '' && trigger == 'GO')
 		{
 			$('#time').val('Enter event time');
 			$('#time_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 		} else if (time != '' && trigger == 'GO')
 			{
 				$('#time_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 			}
 	
 	};	
 	
 	if (trigger == 'WEBSITE' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		var vwebsite = (is_valid_url(website));
 
 		if (vwebsite == false && trigger == 'GO' && website != '' && website != 'Enter event website')
 		{
 						$('#website_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error - Invalid website</font>');
 						$('#website_desc').html('');
 						x=1;
 		} else if (vwebsite == false)
 		{
 						$('#website_error').html('');
 						$('#website_desc').html('Enter event website (Ex. www.eventwebsite.com)');
 						if (website == '' && trigger == 'GO')
 						{
 							$('#website').val('Enter event website');
 							$('#website_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 						} else if (website != '' && trigger == 'GO')
 							{
 								$('#website_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 							}
 		} else
 		{
 				$('#website_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#website_desc').html('');		
 		}		
 	};		
 	
 	if (trigger == 'PHONE' || trigger == 'PHONEB' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 
 		var vphone = (validatePhone(phone));
 
 		if (phone == null || phone == 'Enter phone number' || phone == '' || vphone == false  )
 			{
 					if (trigger == 'PHONEB' || phone == null || phone == '')
 					{
 						$('#phone_error').html('');
 						$('#phone_desc').html('Enter event number (Ex. 800-555-5555)');
 						x=1;
 					} else
 					{
 						$('#phone_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');
 						$('#phone_desc').html('Enter event number (Ex. 800-555-5555)');
 						x=1;
 					}
 			}
 		else
 			{
 				$('#phone_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#phone_desc').html('');
 			};	
 	};					
 	
 	if (x == 1 && trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		$('#main_error_msg').html('<font color="red"><strong>Please correct errors marked in red (above) and re-submit form</strong></font>');
 	} else
 	{
 		$('#main_error_msg').html('');
 	};		
 			
 	if (x == 0 && trigger == 'GO')
 	
 	{
 	var province = $('#province').val();
 	var title = $('#title').val();
 	var date = $('#date').val();
 	var location = $('#location').val();
 	var description = $('#description').val();	
 	
 	var time = $('#time').val();	
 	var website = $('#website').val();
 	var phone = $('#phone').val();
 	
 	if (time == 'Enter event time') {time = null;};
 	if (website == 'Enter event website') {website = null;};
 	if (phone == 'Enter phone number') {phone = null;};		
 				
 	load_div('postEvent_b.php?province=' + province + '&title=' + title + '&date=' + date + '&location=' + location + '&description=' + description + '&time=' + time + '&website=' + website + '&phone=' + phone + '&time=' + time + '&website=' + website + '&phone=' + phone,'map_canvas');
 		setTimeout($.unblockUI, 300);  
 	} else
 	{
 		setTimeout($.unblockUI, 300);
 	};
 			
 		
 }
 function valid_quote(trigger)
 { 
 	//alert(trigger);
 	if (trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		$.blockUI({ overlayCSS: { backgroundColor: '#cee8f4' } });
 	};
 	
 	var today = new Date();
 	var dd = today.getDate();
 	var mm = today.getMonth()+1; //January is 0!
 	var yyyy = today.getFullYear();
 	
 	if(dd<10) {
 		dd='0'+dd
 	} 
 	
 	if(mm<10) {
 		mm='0'+mm
 	} 
 	
 	today = mm+'/'+dd+'/'+yyyy;
 	
 	var provinceq = $('#provinceq').val();
 	var business = $('#business').val();
 	var datepicker_start = $('#datepicker_start').val();
 	var datepicker_end = $('#datepicker_end').val();	
 	var direction = $('#direction').val();
 	var size = $('#size').val();
 	var notes = $('#notes').val();	
 	var phone = $('#phone').val();
 	var emailq = $('#emailq').val();
 	var website = $('#website').val();	
 	var x = 0;
 	
 	if (trigger == 'PROVINCEQ' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{	
 		if (provinceq == 0)
 			{$('#provinceq_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');x=1;}
 		else
 			{
 				$('#provinceq_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#provinceq_desc').html('');
 			};
 	};
 	
 	if (trigger == 'BUSINESS' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{	
 		if (business == null || business == '' || business == 'Enter business name')
 		{
 			if (trigger != 'GO')
 			{
 				$('#business_error').html('');x=1;$('#business_desc').html('Enter business name');
 			} else
 			{
 				$('#business_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');x=1;$('#business_desc').html('Enter business name');				
 			}
 		} else
 			{
 				$('#business_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#business_desc').html('');
 			};
 	};
 	
 //	alert(datepicker_end);
 //	alert(datepicker_start);
 //	alert(today);	
 
 	if (trigger == 'STARTDATE' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{	
 	
 		if (datepicker_start == null || datepicker_start == '' || datepicker_start == 'Preferred start date')
 		{
 			if (trigger != 'GO')
 			{
 				$('#datepicker_start_error').html('');x=1;$('#datepicker_start_desc').html('Preferred start date');
 			} else
 			{
 				$('#datepicker_start_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');x=1;$('#datepicker_start_desc').html('Preferred start date');				
 			}
 		} else
 			{
 				$('#datepicker_start_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#datepicker_start_desc').html('');
 			};
 	};	
 	
 	if (trigger == 'ENDDATE' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{	
 		if (datepicker_end == null || datepicker_end == '' || datepicker_end == 'Preferred end date')
 		{
 			if (trigger != 'GO')
 			{
 				$('#datepicker_end_error').html('');x=1;$('#datepicker_end_desc').html('Preferred end date');
 			} else
 			{
 				$('#datepicker_end_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');x=1;$('#datepicker_end_desc').html('Preferred end date');				
 			}
 		} else
 			{
 				$('#datepicker_end_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#datepicker_end_desc').html('');
 			};
 	};
 	
 	if (trigger == 'DIRECTION' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{	
 		if (direction == null || direction == '' || direction == '0')
 		{
 			if (trigger != 'GO')
 			{
 				$('#direction_error').html('');x=1;$('#direction_desc').html('Select direction');
 			} else
 			{
 				$('#direction_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');x=1;$('#direction_desc').html('Select direction');				
 			}
 		} else
 			{
 				$('#direction_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#direction_desc').html('');
 			};
 	};	
 	
 	if (trigger == 'SIZE' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{	
 		if (size == null || size == '' || size == '0')
 		{
 			if (trigger != 'GO')
 			{
 				$('#size_error').html('');x=1;$('#size_desc').html('Select size');
 			} else
 			{
 				$('#size_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');x=1;$('#size_desc').html('Select size');				
 			}
 		} else
 			{
 				$('#size_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#size_desc').html('');
 			};
 	};		
 	
 	if (trigger == 'PHONE' || trigger == 'PHONEB' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 
 		var vphone = (validatePhone(phone));
 
 		if (phone == null || phone == 'Enter phone number' || phone == '' || vphone == false  )
 			{
 					if (trigger == 'PHONEB' || phone == null || phone == '')
 					{
 						$('#phone_error').html('');
 						$('#phone_desc').html('Enter business number (Ex. 800-555-5555)');
 						x=1;
 					} else
 					{
 						$('#phone_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');
 						$('#phone_desc').html('Enter business number (Ex. 800-555-5555)');
 						x=1;
 					}
 			}
 		else
 			{
 				$('#phone_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#phone_desc').html('');
 			};	
 	};					
 	
 	if (trigger == 'EMAILQ' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		var vemailq = (isRFC822ValidEmailq('emailq'));
 
 		if (emailq == null || emailq == '' || emailq == 'Enter email' || vemailq == false )
 		{
 			if (trigger == 'EMAILQ' || emailq == null || emailq == '' && trigger != 'GO')
 			{
 						$('#emailq_error').html('');
 						$('#emailq_desc').html('Enter email address');
 						x=1;			
 			} else
 			{
 						$('#emailq_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error</font>');
 						$('#emailq_desc').html('Enter email address');
 						x=1;
 			}
 		
 		} else
 			{
 					$('#emailq_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 					$('#emailq_desc').html('');
 			}
 	};	
 	
 	if (trigger == 'WEBSITE' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		var vwebsite = (is_valid_url(website));
 
 		if (vwebsite == false && trigger == 'GO' && website != '' && website != 'Enter business website')
 		{
 						$('#website_error').html('<font color="red">&#10008; Error - Invalid website</font>');
 						$('#website_desc').html('');
 						x=1;
 		} else if (vwebsite == false)
 		{
 						$('#website_error').html('');
 						$('#website_desc').html('Enter business website (Ex. www.yourwebsite.com)');
 						if (website == '' && trigger == 'GO')
 						{
 							$('#website').val('Enter business website');
 							$('#website_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 						} else if (website != '' && trigger == 'GO')
 							{
 								$('#website_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 							}
 		} else
 		{
 				$('#website_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 				$('#website_desc').html('');		
 		}		
 	};		
 	
 	
 	if (trigger == 'NOTES' || trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 
 		$('#notes_error').html('');
 		$('#notes_desc').html('Enter notes (Additional details)');
 		if (notes == '' && trigger == 'GO')
 		{
 			$('#notes').val('Enter notes');
 			$('#notes_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 		} else if (notes != '' && trigger == 'GO')
 			{
 				$('#notes_error').html('<font color="green">&#10004;</font>');
 			}
 	
 	};	
 	
 	if (x == 1 && trigger == 'GO')
 	{
 		$('#main_error_msg').html('<font color="red"><strong>Please correct errors marked in red (above) and re-submit form</strong></font>');
 	} else
 	{
 		$('#main_error_msg').html('');
 	};		
 			
 	if (x == 0 && trigger == 'GO')
 	
 	{
 	var provinceq = $('#provinceq').val();
 	var business = $('#business').val();
 	var datepicker_start = $('#datepicker_start').val();
 	var datepicker_end =   $('#datepicker_end').val();	
 	var direction = $('#direction').val();
 	var size = $('#size').val();
 	var notes = $('#notes').val();	
 	
 	var emailq = $('#emailq').val();	
 	var website = $('#website').val();
 	var phone = $('#phone').val();
 	
 	if (website == 'Enter business website') {website = null;};
 	if (notes == 'Enter notes') {notes = null;};		
 				
 	load_div('quote_b.php?provinceq=' + provinceq + '&business=' + business + '&datepicker_start=' + datepicker_start  + '&datepicker_end=' + datepicker_end + '&direction=' + direction + '&size=' + size + '&notes=' + notes + '&emailq=' + emailq + '&phone=' + phone + '&website=' + website + '&phone=' + phone,'map_canvas');
 		setTimeout($.unblockUI, 300);  
 	} else
 	{
 		setTimeout($.unblockUI, 300);
 	};
 			
 		
 }
 function valid_b()
 {
 	$('#phone_error').html('');
 }
 
 function validatePhone(txtPhone) {
 
     var filter = /^\d{3}-?\d{3}-?\d{4}$/g;
 	var province = $('#province').val();
 	var provinceq = $('#provinceq').val();	
 	//alert(txtPhone);
     if (filter.test(txtPhone) || (txtPhone != '' && province == '5') || (txtPhone != '' && provinceq == '5'))  {
         return true;
     }
     else {
         return false;
     }
 }
 
 function validateLocal(txtLocal) {
 
 	var a = $('#local').val();
 
     var filter = /^\d{3}-?\d{3}-?\d{4}$/g;
     if (filter.test(a)) {
         return true;
     }
     else {
         return false;
     }
 }
 
 function validatePostal(txtPostal) {
 
 	var a = $('#postal').val();
 	var province = $('#province').val();
     var filter = /^(?!.*[DFIOQU])[A-VXY][0-9][A-Z] +?[0-9][A-Z][0-9]$/i;
 	//alert ('window province= ' + province);
     if ((filter.test(a) && province != '5') || (a == '97500' && province == '5')) {
         return true;
     }
     else {
         return false;
     }
 }
 
 function validateEmail(txtEmail) {
 
 	var a = $('#email').val();
 
     var filter = /^(?!.*[DFIOQU])[A-VXY][0-9][A-Z] +?[0-9][A-Z][0-9]$/i;
     if (filter.test(a)) {
         return true;
     }
     else {
         return false;
     }
 }
 
 function isRFC822ValidEmail(sEmail) {
   var sEmail = $('#email').val();
   var sQtext = '[^\\x0d\\x22\\x5c\\x80-\\xff]';
   var sDtext = '[^\\x0d\\x5b-\\x5d\\x80-\\xff]';
   var sAtom = '[^\\x00-\\x20\\x22\\x28\\x29\\x2c\\x2e\\x3a-\\x3c\\x3e\\x40\\x5b-\\x5d\\x7f-\\xff]+';
   var sQuotedPair = '\\x5c[\\x00-\\x7f]';
   var sDomainLiteral = '\\x5b(' + sDtext + '|' + sQuotedPair + ')*\\x5d';
   var sQuotedString = '\\x22(' + sQtext + '|' + sQuotedPair + ')*\\x22';
   var sDomain_ref = sAtom;
   var sSubDomain = '(' + sDomain_ref + '|' + sDomainLiteral + ')';
   var sWord = '(' + sAtom + '|' + sQuotedString + ')';
   var sDomain = sSubDomain + '(\\x2e' + sSubDomain + ')*';
   var sLocalPart = sWord + '(\\x2e' + sWord + ')*';
   var sAddrSpec = sLocalPart + '\\x40' + sDomain; // complete RFC822 email address spec
   var sValidEmail = '^' + sAddrSpec + '$'; // as whole string
   
   var reValidEmail = new RegExp(sValidEmail);
   
   if (reValidEmail.test(sEmail)) {
     return true;
   }
   
   return false;
 }
 function isRFC822ValidEmailq(sEmail) {
   var sEmail = $('#emailq').val();
   var sQtext = '[^\\x0d\\x22\\x5c\\x80-\\xff]';
   var sDtext = '[^\\x0d\\x5b-\\x5d\\x80-\\xff]';
   var sAtom = '[^\\x00-\\x20\\x22\\x28\\x29\\x2c\\x2e\\x3a-\\x3c\\x3e\\x40\\x5b-\\x5d\\x7f-\\xff]+';
   var sQuotedPair = '\\x5c[\\x00-\\x7f]';
   var sDomainLiteral = '\\x5b(' + sDtext + '|' + sQuotedPair + ')*\\x5d';
   var sQuotedString = '\\x22(' + sQtext + '|' + sQuotedPair + ')*\\x22';
   var sDomain_ref = sAtom;
   var sSubDomain = '(' + sDomain_ref + '|' + sDomainLiteral + ')';
   var sWord = '(' + sAtom + '|' + sQuotedString + ')';
   var sDomain = sSubDomain + '(\\x2e' + sSubDomain + ')*';
   var sLocalPart = sWord + '(\\x2e' + sWord + ')*';
   var sAddrSpec = sLocalPart + '\\x40' + sDomain; // complete RFC822 email address spec
   var sValidEmail = '^' + sAddrSpec + '$'; // as whole string
   
   var reValidEmail = new RegExp(sValidEmail);
   
   if (reValidEmail.test(sEmail)) {
     return true;
   }
   
   return false;
 }
 function is_valid_url(url)
 {
 	var re = /^(http[s]?:\/\/){0,1}(www\.){0,1}[a-zA-Z0-9\.\-]+\.[a-zA-Z]{2,5}[\.]{0,1}/;
 	if (!re.test(url)) { 
 		return false;
 	} else
 	{
 		return true; 
 	}
 }
 
 function validateLatitude(txtLatitude) {
 
     var filter = /^([1-8]?[1-9]|[1-9]0)\.{1}\d{1,6}$/;
     if (filter.test(txtLatitude)) {
         return true;
     }
     else {
         return false;
     }
 }
 
 function validateLongitude(txtLongitude) {
 
     var filter = /^-([1]?[1-7][1-9]|[1]?[1-8][0]|[1-9]?[0-9])\.{1}\d{1,6}$/;
     if (filter.test(txtLongitude)) {
         return true;
     }
     else {
         return false;
     }
 }
 
 function validatecouponCode(txtcouponCode) {
 
 
     if (txtcouponCode == '1YEARFREE') {
         return true;
     }
     else {
         return false;
     }
 }
 
 function ResizeIframe(id){
   var frame = window.parent.document.getElementById('iframe');
   frame.style.height = frame.contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight + "px";
  }

    (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){

   <script type="text/javascript">
    var lastNumber;
 
 
 function resizeIframeWidth(e){
     // Set width of iframe according to its content
     if (e.Document && e.Document.body.scrollWidth) //ie5+ syntax
         e.width = e.contentWindow.document.body.scrollWidth;
     else if (e.contentDocument && e.contentDocument.body.scrollWidth) //ns6+ & opera syntax
         e.width = e.contentDocument.body.scrollWidth + 35;
     else (e.contentDocument && e.contentDocument.body.offsetWidth) //standards compliant syntax – ie8
         e.width = e.contentDocument.body.offsetWidth + 35;
 }
 <!--
 function autoResize(id){
     var newheight;
     var newwidth;
 
     if(document.getElementById){
         newheight=document.getElementById(id).contentWindow.document .body.scrollHeight;
         newwidth=document.getElementById(id).contentWindow.document .body.scrollWidth;
     }
 
     document.getElementById(id).height= (newheight) + "px";
     document.getElementById(id).width= (newwidth) + "px";
 }
 //-->
 
 
 
 
 function add_favourite(DBID,FILE,ID,ENTITY) {
 	
 /*	settle = del_cookie('favourites');*/
 	
 	//alert('WITHIN FUNCTION ADD FAVOURITES (TESTING): ' + DBID); 
 	//alert(FILE);
 	//alert(ID);
 	//alert(ENTITY);
 	var favourites_cookie;
 	favourites_cookie = getCookie('favourites');
 	
 	if (favourites_cookie!=null && favourites_cookie!="")
 	{
 /*		alert('COOKIE  FOUND: ' + favourites_cookie);
 */		
 		new_favourites_cookie = favourites_cookie.split(',');
 		
 		var requirePut = "Y";
 		
 		for (var i = 0, length = new_favourites_cookie.length; i < length; i++) {	
 
 				var chunk = new_favourites_cookie[i];
 		
 				if(chunk == DBID)
 				{	
 /*					alert(DBID + "IS EQUAL TO " + chunk);
 */					var requirePut = 'N';
 				} else
 				{
 /*					alert(DBID + " IS NOT EQUAL TO " + chunk);					
 */				}			
 		}
 				
 	   if(requirePut == "Y")
 	   {
 		   //alert('doing put');
 			new_value =  [favourites_cookie,DBID];
 			new_value = new_value.join();
 			setCookie('favourites',new_value,365);		
 			var scrollTop = "N";
 			load_div(FILE,ID,ENTITY,scrollTop);	
 	   } else
 	   {
 		   //alert('ALREADY EXISTS');
 	   }		
 	} else
 	{
 		//alert('COOKIE NOT FOUND');
 		setCookie('favourites',DBID,365);		
 		var scrollTop = "N";
 		load_div(FILE,ID,ENTITY,scrollTop);			
 	}
 
 }
 
 function delete_favourite(DBID,FILE,ID,ENTITY) {
 	
 	/*	settle = del_cookie('favourites');*/
 		
 	//alert('WITHIN FUNCTION DELETE FAVOURITES (TESTING): ' + DBID); 
 	//	alert(FILE);
 	//	alert(ID);
 	//	alert(ENTITY);
 	
 	var favourites_cookie;
 	favourites_cookie = getCookie('favourites');
 	
 	if (favourites_cookie!=null && favourites_cookie!="")
 	{
 		new_favourites_cookie = favourites_cookie.split(',');
 		var new_value = null;
 		var ctr = 0;
 		
 		for (var i = 0, length = new_favourites_cookie.length; i < length; i++) {	
 
 				var chunk = new_favourites_cookie[i];
 				//alert('Chunk: ' + chunk);
 				if(chunk != DBID) // IF CHUNK IS MEANT TO GO BACK INTO COOKIE FILE
 				{	
 					if(ctr == 0)
 					{
 						setCookie('favourites',chunk,365);		
 						ctr = ctr + 1;
 					} else
 					{
 						var favourites_cookie;
 						favourites_cookie = getCookie('favourites');						
 						new_value =  [favourites_cookie,chunk];
 						new_value = new_value.join();
 						setCookie('favourites',new_value,365);	
 						ctr = ctr + 1;
 					}
 				} 	
 		}
 		
 		if (ctr == 0)
 		{
 			del_cookie();
 		}
 
 		//alert('TEST2');
 		location.reload();	
 
 	} 
 
 }
 
 function getCookie(c_name)
 {
 var i,x,y,ARRcookies=document.cookie.split(";");
 for (i=0;i<ARRcookies.length;i++)
   {
   x=ARRcookies[i].substr(0,ARRcookies[i].indexOf("="));
   y=ARRcookies[i].substr(ARRcookies[i].indexOf("=")+1);
   x=x.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,"");
   if (x==c_name)
     {
     return unescape(y);
     }
   }
 }
 
 function setCookie(c_name,value,exdays)
 {
 var exdate=new Date();
 exdate.setDate(exdate.getDate() + exdays);
 var c_value=escape(value) + ((exdays==null) ? "" : "; expires="+exdate.toUTCString());
 document.cookie=c_name + "=" + c_value;
 }	
 
 function del_cookie()
 {
 	//alert('DELETING ALL COOKIES');
     document.cookie = 'favourites' + '=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 GMT;';
 }
 function close_subscribe_hover()
 {
 	var ele = document.getElementById("close_msgbox");
 	ele.style.cursor='pointer';
 }
 function close_subscribe_msg_box()
 {
 	var ele = document.getElementById("testid");	
 	ele.style.display = "none"; 	
 }
 function value_check() {
 	
 	var ele = document.getElementById("vc_textbox");
 	if (ele.value == 'Search' || ele.value == '')
 	{	
 		ele.value = '[NO SEARCH KEYWORD ENTERED]';
 	} 
 }
 function random_advertisement(mode) {
 
 	// mode 1 = all categories
 	// mode 2 = accommodations only
 
 	var xmlhttp;
 	if (window.XMLHttpRequest)
 	  {// code for IE7+, Firefox, Chrome, Opera, Safari
 	  xmlhttp=new XMLHttpRequest();
 	  }
 	else
 	  {// code for IE6, IE5
 	  xmlhttp=new ActiveXObject("Microsoft.XMLHTTP");
 	  }	
 
       xmlhttp.abort();
 	  
       xmlhttp.open("GET", 'random_ad_sub.php?HOMEPAGE=' + window.homepage, true);
 
       xmlhttp.onreadystatechange=function() 
 	  {
 		  
         if(xmlhttp.readyState == 4) {
   
           <!-- document.getElementById(passed_id).src = xmlhttp.responseText; -->
 
          document.getElementById('random_ad').innerHTML = xmlhttp.responseText;
 
 	  		 // alert('after innerhtml code');
         }
       }
 	  
       xmlhttp.send(null);
 
 }
 
 function random_background_photo(mode) {
 	
 		//alert('random_background_photo');
 	
 		random_advertisement();
 		
 		window.markerClicked = undefined;
 	
 	    numberofphotos = 31;
 		
 	    if (mode == 1)
 		{
 			error_dice = 'Y';
 			
 			while (error_dice == 'Y')
 			{
 			
 				var randomnumber=Math.floor(Math.random()*numberofphotos);
 				randomnumber = randomnumber + 1;
 				display_number = randomnumber;
 				
 				if (randomnumber == 2 || 
 					randomnumber == 4 ||
 					randomnumber == 7 ||
 					randomnumber == 14 ||
 					randomnumber == 21 ||
 					randomnumber == 23 ||
 					randomnumber == 25)
 					{ error_dice = 'Y';} else { error_dice = 'N';}
 					
 			}
 				
 			if (randomnumber < 10)
 			{
 				randomnumber = "0" + randomnumber;
 			} 
 			image = "url('bgimages/bg-" + randomnumber + "_1369.jpg')";
 			selectedBg = "bg-" + randomnumber + "_1369.jpg";
 			lastNumber = display_number;
 		}
 		scroll(0,0);
 		parent.document.body.style.backgroundImage=image;
 		parent.document.body.style.backgroundRepeat='no-repeat';
 		parent.document.body.style.backgroundPosition='50% 0%';
 		parent.document.body.style.backgroundAttachment='fixed';
 		parent.document.body.style.MozBackgroundSize = 'cover';
 		parent.document.body.style.backgroundSize = 'cover';
 		parent.document.body.style.height='100%';
 		   
 }
